GP10bhp_06u:1: BhP_06.01.001/1 nivṛttimārgaḥ kathita ādau bhagavatā yathā BhP_06.01.001/2 kramayogopalabdhena brahmaṇā yadasaṃsṛtiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:3: BhP_06.01.002/2 yo 'sāvalīnaprakṛterguṇasargaḥ punaḥ punaḥ BhP_06.01.003/1 adharmalakṣaṇā nānā narakāścānuvarṇitāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:4: BhP_06.01.003/2 manvantaraśca vyākhyāta ādyaḥ svāyambhuvo yataḥ BhP_06.01.004/1 priyavratottānapadorvaṃśastaccaritāni ca BhP_06.01.004/2 dvīpavarṣasamudrādri nadyudyānavanaspatīn BhP_06.01.005/1 dharāmaṇḍalasaṃsthānaṃ bhāgalakṣaṇamānataḥ BhP_06.01.005/2 jyotiṣāṃ vivarāṇāṃ ca yathedamasṛjadvibhuḥ
GP10bhp_06u:5: BhP_06.01.006/1 adhuneha mahābhāga yathaiva narakān naraḥ BhP_06.01.006/2 nānograyātanān neyāt tan me vyākhyātumarhasi BhP_06.01.007/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.01.007/1 na cedihaivāpacitiṃ yathāṃhasaḥ kṛtasya kuryān manauktapāṇibhiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:6: BhP_06.01.007/2 dhruvaṃ sa vai pretya narakān upaiti ye kīrtitā me
GP10bhp_06u:8: BhP_06.01.008/1 tasmāt puraivāśviha pāpaniṣkṛtau yateta mṛtyoravipadyatātmanā BhP_06.01.008/2 doṣasya dṛṣṭvā gurulāghavaṃ yathā bhiṣak cikitseta rujāṃ nidānavit BhP_06.01.009/0 śrīrājovāca
GP10bhp_06u:9: BhP_06.01.009/1 dṛṣṭaśrutābhyāṃ yat pāpaṃ jānannapy ātmano 'hitam
GP10bhp_06u:10: BhP_06.01.009/2 karoti bhūyo vivaśaḥ prāyaścittamatho katham BhP_06.01.010/1 kvacin nivartate 'bhadrāt kvacic carati tat punaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:11: BhP_06.01.010/2 prāyaścittamatho 'pārthaṃ manye kuñjaraśaucavat BhP_06.01.011/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
GP10bhp_06u:12: BhP_06.01.011/1 karmaṇā karmanirhāro na hy ātyantika iṣyate
GP10bhp_06u:15: BhP_06.01.012/2 evaṃ niyamakṛdrājan śanaiḥ kṣemāya kalpate BhP_06.01.013/1 tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śamena ca damena ca
GP10bhp_06u:16: BhP_06.01.013/2 tyāgena satyaśaucābhyāṃ yamena niyamena vā BhP_06.01.014/1 dehavāgbuddhijaṃ dhīrā dharmajñāḥ śraddhayānvitāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:19: BhP_06.01.015/2 aghaṃ dhunvanti kārtsnyena nīhāramiva bhāskaraḥ BhP_06.01.016/1 na tathā hy aghavān rājan pūyeta tapāadibhiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:20: BhP_06.01.016/2 yathā kṛṣṇārpitaprāṇastatpuruṣaniṣevayā BhP_06.01.017/1 sadhrīcīno hy ayaṃ loke panthāḥ kṣemo 'kutobhayaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:24: BhP_06.01.019/1 sakṛn manaḥ kṛṣṇapadāravindayor niveśitaṃ tadguṇarāgi yairiha
GP10bhp_06u:25: BhP_06.01.019/2 na te yamaṃ pāśabhṛtaśca tadbhaṭān svapne 'pi paśyanti hi cīrṇaniṣkṛtāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:27: BhP_06.01.020/2 dūtānāṃ viṣṇuyamayoḥ saṃvādastaṃ nibodha me BhP_06.01.021/1 kānyakubje dvijaḥ kaściddāsīpatirajāmilaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:33: BhP_06.01.024/1 tasya pravayasaḥ putrā daśa teṣāṃ tu yo 'vamaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:34: BhP_06.01.024/2 bālo nārāyaṇo nāmnā pitrośca dayito bhṛśam
GP10bhp_06u:37: BhP_06.01.026/1 bhuñjānaḥ prapiban khādan bālakaṃ snehayantritaḥ BhP_06.01.026/2 bhojayan pāyayan mūḍho na vedāgatamantakam BhP_06.01.027/1 sa evaṃ vartamāno 'jño mṛtyukāla upasthite BhP_06.01.027/2 matiṃ cakāra tanaye bāle nārāyaṇāhvaye BhP_06.01.028/1 sa pāśahastāṃstrīn dṛṣṭvā puruṣān atidāruṇān BhP_06.01.028/2 vakratuṇḍān ūrdhvaromṇa ātmānaṃ netumāgatān
GP10bhp_06u:39: BhP_06.01.029/2 plāvitena svareṇoccairājuhāvākulendriyaḥ BhP_06.01.030/1 niśamya mriyamāṇasya mukhato harikīrtanam
GP10bhp_06u:43: BhP_06.01.032/1 ūcurniṣedhitāstāṃste vaivasvatapuraḥsarāḥ BhP_06.01.032/2 ke yūyaṃ pratiṣeddhāro dharmarājasya śāsanam BhP_06.01.033/1 kasya vā kuta āyātāḥ kasmādasya niṣedhatha
GP10bhp_06u:44: BhP_06.01.033/2 kiṃ devā upadevā yā yūyaṃ kiṃ siddhasattamāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:47: BhP_06.01.035/1 sarve ca nūtnavayasaḥ sarve cārucaturbhujāḥ BhP_06.01.035/2 dhanurniṣaṅgāsigadā śaṅkhacakrāmbujaśriyaḥ BhP_06.01.036/1 diśo vitimirālokāḥ kurvantaḥ svena tejasā BhP_06.01.036/2 kimarthaṃ dharmapālasya kiṅkarān no niṣedhatha BhP_06.01.037/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.01.037/1 ity ukte yamadūtaiste vāsudevoktakāriṇaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:48: BhP_06.01.037/2 tān pratyūcuḥ prahasyedaṃ meghanirhrādayā girā BhP_06.01.038/0 śrīviṣṇudūtā ūcuḥ BhP_06.01.038/1 yūyaṃ vai dharmarājasya yadi nirdeśakāriṇaḥ BhP_06.01.038/2 brūta dharmasya nastattvaṃ yac cādharmasya lakṣaṇam
GP10bhp_06u:49: BhP_06.01.039/1 kathaṃ sviddhriyate daṇḍaḥ kiṃ vāsya sthānamīpsitam
GP10bhp_06u:50: BhP_06.01.039/2 daṇḍyāḥ kiṃ kāriṇaḥ sarve āho svit katicin nṛṇām BhP_06.01.040/0 yamadūtā ūcuḥ BhP_06.01.040/1 vedapraṇihito dharmo hy adharmastadviparyayaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:51: BhP_06.01.040/2 vedo nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣāt svayambhūriti śuśruma BhP_06.01.041/1 yena svadhāmny amī bhāvā rajaḥsattvatamomayāḥ BhP_06.01.041/2 guṇanāmakriyārūpairvibhāvyante yathātatham BhP_06.01.042/1 sūryo 'gniḥ khaṃ maruddevaḥ somaḥ sandhyāhanī diśaḥ BhP_06.01.042/2 kaṃ kuḥ svayaṃ dharma iti hy ete daihyasya sākṣiṇaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:52: BhP_06.01.043/1 etairadharmo vijñātaḥ sthānaṃ daṇḍasya yujyate BhP_06.01.043/2 sarve karmānurodhena daṇḍamarhanti kāriṇaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:53: BhP_06.01.044/1 sambhavanti hi bhadrāṇi viparītāni cānaghāḥ BhP_06.01.044/2 kāriṇāṃ guṇasaṅgo 'sti dehavān na hy akarmakṛt
GP10bhp_06u:54: BhP_06.01.045/1 yena yāvān yathādharmo dharmo veha samīhitaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:55: BhP_06.01.045/2 sa eva tatphalaṃ bhuṅkte tathā tāvadamutra vai
GP10bhp_06u:56: BhP_06.01.046/1 yatheha devapravarāstraividhyamupalabhyate BhP_06.01.046/2 bhūteṣu guṇavaicitryāt
GP10bhp_06u:58: BhP_06.01.047/2 evaṃ janmānyayoretaddharmādharmanidarśanam BhP_06.01.048/1 manasaiva pure devaḥ pūrvarūpaṃ vipaśyati BhP_06.01.048/2 anumīmāṃsate 'pūrvaṃ manasā bhagavān ajaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:59: BhP_06.01.049/1 yathājñastamasā yukta upāste vyaktameva hi BhP_06.01.049/2 na veda pūrvamaparaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:60: BhP_06.01.050/1 pañcabhiḥ kurute svārthān pañca vedātha pañcabhiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:61: BhP_06.01.050/2 ekastu ṣoḍaśena trīn svayaṃ saptadaśo 'śnute
GP10bhp_06u:62: BhP_06.01.051/1 tadetat ṣoḍaśakalaṃ liṅgaṃ śaktitrayaṃ mahat BhP_06.01.051/2 dhatte 'nusaṃsṛtiṃ puṃsi harṣaśokabhayārtidām BhP_06.01.052/1 dehy ajño 'jitaṣaḍvargo necchan karmāṇi kāryate
GP10bhp_06u:64: BhP_06.01.053/1 na hi kaścit kṣaṇamapi jātu tiṣṭhaty akarmakṛt
GP10bhp_06u:65: BhP_06.01.053/2 kāryate hy avaśaḥ karma guṇaiḥ svābhāvikairbalāt
GP10bhp_06u:66: BhP_06.01.054/1 labdhvā nimittamavyaktaṃ vyaktāvyaktaṃ bhavaty uta BhP_06.01.054/2 yathāyoni yathābījaṃ svabhāvena balīyasā
GP10bhp_06u:68: BhP_06.01.055/2 āsīt sa eva na cirādīśasaṅgādvilīyate BhP_06.01.056/1 ayaṃ hi śrutasampannaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:69: BhP_06.01.056/2 dhṛtavrato mṛdurdāntaḥ satyavāṅ mantravic chuciḥ BhP_06.01.057/1 gurvagnyatithivṛddhānāṃ śuśrūṣuranahaṅkṛtaḥ BhP_06.01.057/2 sarvabhūtasuhṛt sādhurmitavāg anasūyakaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:72: BhP_06.01.059/1 dadarśa kāminaṃ kañcic chūdraṃ saha bhujiṣyayā
GP10bhp_06u:73: BhP_06.01.059/2 pītvā ca madhu maireyaṃ madāghūrṇitanetrayā BhP_06.01.060/1 mattayā viślathannīvyā vyapetaṃ nirapatrapam
GP10bhp_06u:74: BhP_06.01.060/2 krīḍantamanugāyantaṃ hasantamanayāntike BhP_06.01.061/1 dṛṣṭvā tāṃ kāmaliptena bāhunā parirambhitām BhP_06.01.061/2 jagāma hṛcchayavaśaṃ sahasaiva vimohitaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:76: BhP_06.01.062/2 na śaśāka samādhātuṃ mano madanavepitam BhP_06.01.063/1 tannimittasmaravyāja grahagrasto vicetanaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:77: BhP_06.01.063/2 tāmeva manasā dhyāyan svadharmādvirarāma ha BhP_06.01.064/1 tāmeva toṣayāmāsa pitryeṇārthena yāvatā
GP10bhp_06u:78: BhP_06.01.064/2 grāmyairmanoramaiḥ kāmaiḥ prasīdeta yathā tathā BhP_06.01.065/1 viprāṃ svabhāryāmaprauḍhāṃ kule mahati lambhitām BhP_06.01.065/2 visasarjācirāt pāpaḥ svairiṇyāpāṅgaviddhadhīḥ
GP10bhp_06u:83: BhP_06.01.068/1 tata enaṃ daṇḍapāṇeḥ sakāśaṃ kṛtakilbiṣam BhP_06.01.068/2 neṣyāmo 'kṛtanirveśaṃ yatra daṇḍena śuddhyati
GP10bhp_06u:87: BhP_06.02.002/0 śrīviṣṇudūtā ūcuḥ BhP_06.02.002/1 aho kaṣṭaṃ dharmadṛśāmadharmaḥ spṛśate sabhām BhP_06.02.002/2 yatrādaṇḍyeṣvapāpeṣu daṇḍo yairdhriyate vṛthā
GP10bhp_06u:88: BhP_06.02.003/1 prajānāṃ pitaro ye ca śāstāraḥ sādhavaḥ samāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:89: BhP_06.02.003/2 yadi syāt teṣu vaiṣamyaṃ kaṃ yānti śaraṇaṃ prajāḥ BhP_06.02.004/1 yadyadācarati śreyān itarastat tadīhate
GP10bhp_06u:90: BhP_06.02.004/2 sa yat pramāṇaṃ kurute lokastadanuvartate BhP_06.02.005/1 yasyāṅke śira ādhāya lokaḥ svapiti nirvṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:91: BhP_06.02.005/2 svayaṃ dharmamadharmaṃ vā na hi veda yathā paśuḥ BhP_06.02.006/1 sa kathaṃ nyarpitātmānaṃ kṛtamaitramacetanam
GP10bhp_06u:94: BhP_06.02.007/2 yadvyājahāra vivaśo nāma svastyayanaṃ hareḥ BhP_06.02.008/1 etenaiva hy aghono 'sya kṛtaṃ syādaghaniṣkṛtam BhP_06.02.008/2 yadā nārāyaṇāyeti jagāda caturakṣaram
GP10bhp_06u:95: BhP_06.02.009/1 stenaḥ surāpo mitradhrug brahmahā gurutalpagaḥ BhP_06.02.009/2 strīrājapitṛgohantā ye ca pātakino 'pare
GP10bhp_06u:98: BhP_06.02.011/1 na niṣkṛtairuditairbrahmavādibhis tathā viśuddhyaty aghavān vratādibhiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:100: BhP_06.02.012/1 naikāntikaṃ taddhi kṛte 'pi niṣkṛte manaḥ punardhāvati
GP10bhp_06u:102: BhP_06.02.012/2 tat karmanirhāramabhīpsatāṃ harer guṇānuvādaḥ khalu sattvabhāvanaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:105: BhP_06.02.014/1 sāṅketyaṃ pārihāsyaṃ vā stobhaṃ helanameva vā
GP10bhp_06u:106: BhP_06.02.014/2 vaikuṇṭhanāmagrahaṇamaśeṣāghaharaṃ viduḥ BhP_06.02.015/1 patitaḥ skhalito bhagnaḥ sandaṣṭastapta āhataḥ BhP_06.02.015/2 haririty avaśenāha pumān nārhati yātanāḥ BhP_06.02.016/1 gurūṇāṃ ca laghūnāṃ ca gurūṇi ca laghūni ca BhP_06.02.016/2 prāyaścittāni pāpānāṃ jñātvoktāni maharṣibhiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:112: BhP_06.02.019/2 ajānato 'py ātmaguṇaṃ kuryān mantro 'py udāhṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:113: BhP_06.02.020/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.02.020/1 ta evaṃ suvinirṇīya dharmaṃ bhāgavataṃ nṛpa
GP10bhp_06u:114: BhP_06.02.020/2 taṃ yāmyapāśān nirmucya vipraṃ mṛtyoramūmucan BhP_06.02.021/1 iti pratyuditā yāmyā dūtā yātvā yamāntikam
GP10bhp_06u:116: BhP_06.02.022/1 dvijaḥ pāśādvinirmukto gatabhīḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ BhP_06.02.022/2 vavande śirasā viṣṇoḥ kiṅkarān darśanotsavaḥ BhP_06.02.023/1 taṃ vivakṣumabhipretya mahāpuruṣakiṅkarāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:119: BhP_06.02.024/2 dharmaṃ bhāgavataṃ śuddhaṃ traivedyaṃ ca guṇāśrayam
GP10bhp_06u:123: BhP_06.02.026/2 yena viplāvitaṃ brahma vṛṣalyāṃ jāyatātmanā BhP_06.02.027/1 dhiṅ māṃ vigarhitaṃ sadbhirduṣkṛtaṃ kulakajjalam BhP_06.02.027/2 hitvā bālāṃ satīṃ yo 'haṃ surāpīmasatīmagām
GP10bhp_06u:126: BhP_06.02.029/1 so 'haṃ vyaktaṃ patiṣyāmi narake bhṛśadāruṇe
GP10bhp_06u:127: BhP_06.02.029/2 dharmaghnāḥ kāmino yatra vindanti yamayātanāḥ BhP_06.02.030/1 kimidaṃ svapna āho svit sākṣāddṛṣṭamihādbhutam BhP_06.02.030/2 kva yātā adya te ye māṃ vyakarṣan pāśapāṇayaḥ BhP_06.02.031/1 atha te kva gatāḥ siddhāścatvāraścārudarśanāḥ BhP_06.02.031/2 vyāmocayan nīyamānaṃ baddhvā pāśairadho bhuvaḥ BhP_06.02.032/1 athāpi me durbhagasya vibudhottamadarśane
GP10bhp_06u:128: BhP_06.02.032/2 bhavitavyaṃ maṅgalena yenātmā me prasīdati BhP_06.02.033/1 anyathā mriyamāṇasya
GP10bhp_06u:130: BhP_06.02.034/1 kva cāhaṃ kitavaḥ pāpo brahmaghno nirapatrapaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:131: BhP_06.02.034/2 kva ca nārāyaṇety etadbhagavannāma maṅgalam BhP_06.02.035/1 so 'haṃ tathā yatiṣyāmi yatacittendriyānilaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:132: BhP_06.02.035/2 yathā na bhūya ātmānamandhe tamasi majjaye
GP10bhp_06u:134: BhP_06.02.036/2 sarvabhūtasuhṛc chānto maitraḥ karuṇa ātmavān BhP_06.02.037/1 mocaye grastamātmānaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:137: BhP_06.02.038/2 dhāsye mano bhagavati śuddhaṃ tatkīrtanādibhiḥ BhP_06.02.039/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.02.039/1 iti jātasunirvedaḥ kṣaṇasaṅgena sādhuṣu
GP10bhp_06u:138: BhP_06.02.039/2 gaṅgādvāramupeyāya muktasarvānubandhanaḥ BhP_06.02.040/1 sa tasmin devasadana āsīno yogamāsthitaḥ BhP_06.02.040/2 pratyāhṛtendriyagrāmo yuyoja mana ātmani
GP10bhp_06u:142: BhP_06.02.042/2 upalabhyopalabdhān prāg vavande śirasā dvijaḥ BhP_06.02.043/1 hitvā kalevaraṃ tīrthe gaṅgāyāṃ darśanādanu BhP_06.02.043/2 sadyaḥ svarūpaṃ jagṛhe bhagavatpārśvavartinām
GP10bhp_06u:144: BhP_06.02.044/2 haimaṃ vimānamāruhya yayau yatra śriyaḥ patiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:145: BhP_06.02.045/1 evaṃ sa viplāvitasarvadharmā dāsyāḥ patiḥ patito
GP10bhp_06u:147: BhP_06.02.045/2 nipātyamāno niraye hatavrataḥ sadyo vimukto bhagavannāma
GP10bhp_06u:149: BhP_06.02.046/1 nātaḥ paraṃ karmanibandhakṛntanaṃ mumukṣatāṃ tīrthapadānukīrtanāt BhP_06.02.046/2 na yat punaḥ karmasu sajjate mano rajastamobhyāṃ kalilaṃ tato 'nyathā
GP10bhp_06u:151: BhP_06.02.047/2 śṛṇuyāc chraddhayā yukto yaśca bhaktyānukīrtayet BhP_06.02.048/1 na vai sa narakaṃ yāti nekṣito yamakiṅkaraiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:152: BhP_06.02.048/2 yady apy amaṅgalo martyo viṣṇuloke mahīyate
GP10bhp_06u:154: BhP_06.02.049/2 ajāmilo 'py agāddhāma kimuta śraddhayā gṛṇan
GP10bhp_06u:156: BhP_06.03.001/1 niśamya devaḥ svabhaṭopavarṇitaṃ pratyāha kiṃ tān api dharmarājaḥ BhP_06.03.001/2 evaṃ hatājño vihatān murārer naideśikairyasya vaśe jano
GP10bhp_06u:158: BhP_06.03.002/1 yamasya devasya na daṇḍabhaṅgaḥ kutaścanarṣe śrutapūrva
GP10bhp_06u:160: BhP_06.03.002/2 etan mune vṛścati lokasaṃśayaṃ na hi tvadanya iti me
GP10bhp_06u:162: BhP_06.03.003/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.03.003/1 bhagavatpuruṣai rājan yāmyāḥ pratihatodyamāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:164: BhP_06.03.004/0 yamadūtā ūcuḥ BhP_06.03.004/1 kati santīha śāstāro jīvalokasya vai prabho
GP10bhp_06u:166: BhP_06.03.005/1 yadi syurbahavo loke śāstāro daṇḍadhāriṇaḥ BhP_06.03.005/2 kasya syātāṃ na vā kasya mṛtyuścāmṛtameva vā
GP10bhp_06u:171: BhP_06.03.008/1 tasya te vihito daṇḍo na loke vartate 'dhunā
GP10bhp_06u:173: BhP_06.03.009/1 nīyamānaṃ tavādeśādasmābhiryātanāgṛhān BhP_06.03.009/2 vyāmocayan pātakinaṃ chittvā pāśān prasahya te
GP10bhp_06u:174: BhP_06.03.010/1 tāṃste veditumicchāmo yadi no manyase kṣamam
GP10bhp_06u:175: BhP_06.03.010/2 nārāyaṇety abhihite mā bhairity āyayurdrutam BhP_06.03.011/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
GP10bhp_06u:176: BhP_06.03.011/1 iti devaḥ sa āpṛṣṭaḥ prajāsaṃyamano yamaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:177: BhP_06.03.011/2 prītaḥ svadūtān pratyāha smaran pādāmbujaṃ hareḥ
GP10bhp_06u:178: BhP_06.03.012/0 yama uvāca BhP_06.03.012/1 paro madanyo jagatastasthuṣaśca otaṃ protaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:180: BhP_06.03.012/2 yadaṃśato 'sya sthitijanmanāśā nasy otavadyasya vaśe ca lokaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:181: BhP_06.03.013/1 yo nāmabhirvāci janaṃ nijāyāṃ badhnāti tantryāmiva
GP10bhp_06u:183: BhP_06.03.013/2 yasmai baliṃ ta ime nāmakarma nibandhabaddhāścakitā
GP10bhp_06u:185: BhP_06.03.014/1 ahaṃ mahendro nirṛtiḥ pracetāḥ somo 'gnirīśaḥ pavano viriñciḥ BhP_06.03.014/2 ādityaviśve vasavo 'tha sādhyā marudgaṇā rudragaṇāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:187: BhP_06.03.015/1 anye ca ye viśvasṛjo 'mareśā bhṛgvādayo
GP10bhp_06u:189: BhP_06.03.015/2 yasyehitaṃ na viduḥ spṛṣṭamāyāḥ sattvapradhānā api kiṃ tato 'nye
GP10bhp_06u:190: BhP_06.03.016/1 yaṃ vai na gobhirmanasāsubhirvā hṛdā girā vāsubhṛto vicakṣate BhP_06.03.016/2 ātmānamantarhṛdi santamātmanāṃ cakṣuryathaivākṛtayastataḥ
GP10bhp_06u:194: BhP_06.03.017/2 prāyeṇa dūtā iha vai manoharāś caranti
GP10bhp_06u:196: BhP_06.03.018/1 bhūtāni viṣṇoḥ surapūjitāni durdarśaliṅgāni mahādbhutāni BhP_06.03.018/2 rakṣanti tadbhaktimataḥ parebhyo mattaśca martyān atha
GP10bhp_06u:198: BhP_06.03.019/1 dharmaṃ tu sākṣādbhagavatpraṇītaṃ na vai vidurṛṣayo nāpi devāḥ BhP_06.03.019/2 na siddhamukhyā asurā manuṣyāḥ kuto nu
GP10bhp_06u:200: BhP_06.03.020/1 svayambhūrnāradaḥ śambhuḥ kumāraḥ kapilo manuḥ BhP_06.03.020/2 prahlādo janako bhīṣmo balirvaiyāsakirvayam
GP10bhp_06u:201: BhP_06.03.021/1 dvādaśaite vijānīmo dharmaṃ bhāgavataṃ bhaṭāḥ BhP_06.03.021/2 guhyaṃ viśuddhaṃ durbodhaṃ yaṃ jñātvāmṛtamaśnute BhP_06.03.022/1 etāvān eva loke 'smin puṃsāṃ dharmaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:204: BhP_06.03.023/2 ajāmilo 'pi yenaiva mṛtyupāśādamucyata BhP_06.03.024/1 etāvatālamaghanirharaṇāya puṃsāṃ BhP_06.03.024/2 saṅkīrtanaṃ bhagavato guṇakarmanāmnām
GP10bhp_06u:207: BhP_06.03.025/1 prāyeṇa veda tadidaṃ na mahājano 'yaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:209: BhP_06.03.025/3 trayyāṃ jaḍīkṛtamatirmadhupuṣpitāyāṃ BhP_06.03.025/4 vaitānike mahati karmaṇi
GP10bhp_06u:210: BhP_06.03.026/1 evaṃ vimṛśya sudhiyo bhagavaty anante BhP_06.03.026/2 sarvātmanā vidadhate khalu bhāvayogam
GP10bhp_06u:211: BhP_06.03.026/3 te me na daṇḍamarhanty atha yady amīṣāṃ
GP10bhp_06u:212: BhP_06.03.026/4 syāt pātakaṃ tadapi hanty urugāyavādaḥ BhP_06.03.027/1 te devasiddhaparigītapavitragāthā BhP_06.03.027/2 ye sādhavaḥ samadṛśo bhagavatprapannāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:214: BhP_06.03.027/4 naiṣāṃ vayaṃ na ca vayaḥ prabhavāma daṇḍe
GP10bhp_06u:217: BhP_06.03.028/3 niṣkiñcanaiḥ paramahaṃsakulairasaṅgair BhP_06.03.028/4 juṣṭādgṛhe nirayavartmani
GP10bhp_06u:220: BhP_06.03.029/3 kṛṣṇāya no namati yacchira ekadāpi BhP_06.03.029/4 tān ānayadhvamasato
GP10bhp_06u:221: BhP_06.03.030/1 tat kṣamyatāṃ sa bhagavān puruṣaḥ purāṇo
GP10bhp_06u:227: BhP_06.03.032/1 śṛṇvatāṃ gṛṇatāṃ vīryāṇy uddāmāni harermuhuḥ BhP_06.03.032/2 yathā sujātayā bhaktyā śuddhyen nātmā vratādibhiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:231: BhP_06.03.033/4 īheta karma yata eva rajaḥ punaḥ syāt
GP10bhp_06u:234: BhP_06.03.034/3 naivācyutāśrayajanaṃ pratiśaṅkamānā BhP_06.03.034/4 draṣṭuṃ ca bibhyati tataḥ prabhṛti sma rājan
GP10bhp_06u:240: BhP_06.04.002/1 tasyaiva vyāsamicchāmi jñātuṃ te bhagavan yathā
GP10bhp_06u:241: BhP_06.04.002/2 anusargaṃ yayā śaktyā sasarja bhagavān paraḥ
GP10bhp_06u:242: BhP_06.04.003/0 śrīsūta uvāca BhP_06.04.003/1 iti sampraśnamākarṇya rājarṣerbādarāyaṇiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:244: BhP_06.04.004/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.04.004/1 yadā pracetasaḥ putrā daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ BhP_06.04.004/2 antaḥsamudrādunmagnā dadṛśurgāṃ drumairvṛtām
GP10bhp_06u:248: BhP_06.04.006/2 rājovāca mahān somo manyuṃ praśamayanniva BhP_06.04.007/1 na drumebhyo mahābhāgā dīnebhyo drogdhumarhatha BhP_06.04.007/2 vivardhayiṣavo yūyaṃ prajānāṃ patayaḥ smṛtāḥ BhP_06.04.008/1 aho prajāpatipatirbhagavān hariravyayaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:250: BhP_06.04.009/1 annaṃ carāṇāmacarā hy apadaḥ pādacāriṇām BhP_06.04.009/2 ahastā hastayuktānāṃ dvipadāṃ ca catuṣpadaḥ BhP_06.04.010/1 yūyaṃ ca pitrānvādiṣṭā devadevena cānaghāḥ BhP_06.04.010/2 prajāsargāya hi kathaṃ vṛkṣān nirdagdhumarhatha BhP_06.04.011/1 ātiṣṭhata satāṃ mārgaṃ kopaṃ yacchata dīpitam
GP10bhp_06u:251: BhP_06.04.011/2 pitrā pitāmahenāpi juṣṭaṃ vaḥ prapitāmahaiḥ BhP_06.04.012/1 tokānāṃ pitarau bandhū dṛśaḥ pakṣma striyāḥ patiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:252: BhP_06.04.012/2 patiḥ prajānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gṛhy ajñānāṃ budhaḥ suhṛt
GP10bhp_06u:254: BhP_06.04.013/2 sarvaṃ taddhiṣṇyamīkṣadhvamevaṃ vastoṣito hy asau BhP_06.04.014/1 yaḥ samutpatitaṃ deha ākāśān manyumulbaṇam BhP_06.04.014/2 ātmajijñāsayā yacchet sa guṇān ativartate BhP_06.04.015/1 alaṃ dagdhairdrumairdīnaiḥ khilānāṃ śivamastu vaḥ BhP_06.04.015/2 vārkṣī hy eṣā varā kanyā patnītve pratigṛhyatām
GP10bhp_06u:255: BhP_06.04.016/1 ity āmantrya varārohāṃ kanyāmāpsarasīṃ nṛpa BhP_06.04.016/2 somo rājā yayau dattvā te dharmeṇopayemire
GP10bhp_06u:258: BhP_06.04.018/1 yathā sasarja bhūtāni dakṣo duhitṛvatsalaḥ BhP_06.04.018/2 retasā manasā caiva tan mamāvahitaḥ śṛṇu
GP10bhp_06u:260: BhP_06.04.019/2 devāsuramanuṣyādīn nabhaḥsthalajalaukasaḥ BhP_06.04.020/1 tamabṛṃhitamālokya prajāsargaṃ prajāpatiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:262: BhP_06.04.021/1 tatrāghamarṣaṇaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ pāpaharaṃ param BhP_06.04.021/2 upaspṛśyānusavanaṃ tapasātoṣayaddharim BhP_06.04.022/1 astauṣīddhaṃsaguhyena bhagavantamadhokṣajam BhP_06.04.022/2 tubhyaṃ tadabhidhāsyāmi kasyātuṣyadyathā hariḥ
GP10bhp_06u:265: BhP_06.04.023/2 adṛṣṭadhāmne guṇatattvabuddhibhir nivṛttamānāya dadhe svayambhuve BhP_06.04.024/1 na yasya sakhyaṃ puruṣo 'vaiti sakhyuḥ sakhā vasan
GP10bhp_06u:267: BhP_06.04.024/2 guṇo yathā guṇino vyaktadṛṣṭes tasmai maheśāya namaskaromi
GP10bhp_06u:268: BhP_06.04.025/1 deho 'savo 'kṣā manavo bhūtamātrām ātmānamanyaṃ ca viduḥ paraṃ yat BhP_06.04.025/2 sarvaṃ pumān veda guṇāṃśca tajjño na veda sarvajñamanantamīḍe BhP_06.04.026/1 yadoparāmo manaso nāmarūpa rūpasya dṛṣṭasmṛtisampramoṣāt BhP_06.04.026/2 ya īyate kevalayā svasaṃsthayā haṃsāya tasmai śucisadmane namaḥ BhP_06.04.027/1 manīṣiṇo 'ntarhṛdi sanniveśitaṃ svaśaktibhirnavabhiśca trivṛdbhiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:269: BhP_06.04.027/2 vahniṃ yathā dāruṇi pāñcadaśyaṃ manīṣayā niṣkarṣanti
GP10bhp_06u:272: BhP_06.04.028/2 sa sarvanāmā sa ca viśvarūpaḥ prasīdatāmaniruktātmaśaktiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:273: BhP_06.04.029/1 yadyan niruktaṃ vacasā nirūpitaṃ dhiyākṣabhirvā manasota
GP10bhp_06u:275: BhP_06.04.029/2 mā bhūt svarūpaṃ guṇarūpaṃ hi tat tat sa vai
GP10bhp_06u:277: BhP_06.04.030/1 yasmin yato yena ca yasya yasmai yadyo yathā kurute
GP10bhp_06u:278: kāryate ca BhP_06.04.030/2 parāvareṣāṃ paramaṃ prāk prasiddhaṃ tadbrahma taddheturananyadekam
GP10bhp_06u:279: BhP_06.04.031/1 yacchaktayo vadatāṃ vādināṃ vai vivādasaṃvādabhuvo bhavanti
GP10bhp_06u:280: BhP_06.04.031/2 kurvanti caiṣāṃ muhurātmamohaṃ tasmai namo 'nantaguṇāya
GP10bhp_06u:282: BhP_06.04.032/1 astīti nāstīti ca vastuniṣṭhayor ekasthayorbhinnaviruddhadharmaṇoḥ BhP_06.04.032/2 avekṣitaṃ kiñcana yogasāṅkhyayoḥ samaṃ paraṃ hy anukūlaṃ bṛhat tat
GP10bhp_06u:283: BhP_06.04.033/1 yo 'nugrahārthaṃ bhajatāṃ pādamūlam anāmarūpo bhagavān anantaḥ BhP_06.04.033/2 nāmāni rūpāṇi ca janmakarmabhir bheje sa mahyaṃ paramaḥ prasīdatu
GP10bhp_06u:284: BhP_06.04.034/1 yaḥ prākṛtairjñānapathairjanānāṃ yathāśayaṃ dehagato vibhāti BhP_06.04.034/2 yathānilaḥ pārthivamāśrito guṇaṃ sa īśvaro me kurutāṃ manoratham BhP_06.04.035/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.04.035/1 iti stutaḥ saṃstuvataḥ sa tasminnaghamarṣaṇe BhP_06.04.035/2 prādurāsīt kuruśreṣṭha bhagavān bhaktavatsalaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:286: BhP_06.04.036/2 cakraśaṅkhāsicarmeṣu dhanuḥpāśagadādharaḥ BhP_06.04.037/1 pītavāsā ghanaśyāmaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:287: BhP_06.04.037/2 vanamālānivītāṅgo lasacchrīvatsakaustubhaḥ BhP_06.04.038/1 mahākirīṭakaṭakaḥ sphuranmakarakuṇḍalaḥ BhP_06.04.038/2 kāñcyaṅgulīyavalaya nūpurāṅgadabhūṣitaḥ BhP_06.04.039/1 trailokyamohanaṃ rūpaṃ bibhrat tribhuvaneśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_06u:294: BhP_06.04.042/1 taṃ tathāvanataṃ bhaktaṃ prajākāmaṃ prajāpatim BhP_06.04.042/2 cittajñaḥ sarvabhūtānāmidamāha janārdanaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:295: BhP_06.04.043/0 śrībhagavān uvāca BhP_06.04.043/1 prācetasa mahābhāga saṃsiddhastapasā
GP10bhp_06u:296: BhP_06.04.043/2 yac chraddhayā matparayā mayi bhāvaṃ paraṃ gataḥ
GP10bhp_06u:297: BhP_06.04.044/1 prīto 'haṃ te prajānātha yat te 'syodbṛṃhaṇaṃ tapaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:299: BhP_06.04.045/1 brahmā bhavo bhavantaśca manavo vibudheśvarāḥ BhP_06.04.045/2 vibhūtayo mama hy etā bhūtānāṃ bhūtihetavaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:300: BhP_06.04.046/1 tapo me hṛdayaṃ brahmaṃstanurvidyā kriyākṛtiḥ BhP_06.04.046/2 aṅgāni kratavo jātā dharma ātmāsavaḥ surāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:303: BhP_06.04.048/1 mayy anantaguṇe 'nante guṇato guṇavigrahaḥ BhP_06.04.048/2 yadāsīt tata evādyaḥ svayambhūḥ samabhūdajaḥ BhP_06.04.049/1 sa vai yadā mahādevo mama vīryopabṛṃhitaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:307: BhP_06.04.051/1 eṣā pañcajanasyāṅga duhitā vai prajāpateḥ BhP_06.04.051/2 asiknī nāma patnītve prajeśa pratigṛhyatām BhP_06.04.052/1 mithunavyavāyadharmastvaṃ prajāsargamimaṃ punaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:309: BhP_06.04.053/1 tvatto 'dhastāt prajāḥ sarvā mithunībhūya māyayā
GP10bhp_06u:310: BhP_06.04.053/2 madīyayā bhaviṣyanti hariṣyanti ca me balim
GP10bhp_06u:311: BhP_06.04.054/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.04.054/1 ity uktvā miṣatastasya bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ BhP_06.04.054/2 svapnopalabdhārtha iva tatraivāntardadhe hariḥ
GP10bhp_06u:312: BhP_06.05.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.05.001/1 tasyāṃ sa pāñcajanyāṃ vai viṣṇumāyopabṛṃhitaḥ BhP_06.05.001/2 haryaśvasaṃjñān ayutaṃ putrān ajanayadvibhuḥ
GP10bhp_06u:314: BhP_06.05.002/2 pitrā proktāḥ prajāsarge pratīcīṃ prayayurdiśam BhP_06.05.003/1 tatra nārāyaṇasarastīrthaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:316: BhP_06.05.004/1 tadupasparśanādeva vinirdhūtamalāśayāḥ BhP_06.05.004/2 dharme pāramahaṃsye ca protpannamatayo 'py uta
GP10bhp_06u:317: BhP_06.05.005/1 tepire tapa evograṃ pitrādeśena yantritāḥ BhP_06.05.005/2 prajāvivṛddhaye yattān devarṣistān dadarśa ha BhP_06.05.006/1 uvāca cātha haryaśvāḥ kathaṃ srakṣyatha vai prajāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:318: BhP_06.05.006/2 adṛṣṭvāntaṃ bhuvo yūyaṃ bāliśā bata pālakāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:320: BhP_06.05.007/2 bahurūpāṃ striyaṃ cāpi pumāṃsaṃ puṃścalīpatim BhP_06.05.008/1 nadīmubhayato vāhāṃ pañcapañcādbhutaṃ gṛham
GP10bhp_06u:321: BhP_06.05.008/2 kvaciddhaṃsaṃ citrakathaṃ kṣaurapavyaṃ svayaṃ bhrami BhP_06.05.009/1 kathaṃ svapiturādeśamavidvāṃso vipaścitaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:323: BhP_06.05.010/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.05.010/1 tan niśamyātha haryaśvā autpattikamanīṣayā
GP10bhp_06u:324: BhP_06.05.010/2 vācaḥ kūṭaṃ tu devarṣeḥ svayaṃ vimamṛśurdhiyā
GP10bhp_06u:325: BhP_06.05.011/1 bhūḥ kṣetraṃ jīvasaṃjñaṃ yadanādi nijabandhanam BhP_06.05.011/2 adṛṣṭvā tasya nirvāṇaṃ kimasatkarmabhirbhavet
GP10bhp_06u:326: BhP_06.05.012/1 eka eveśvarasturyo bhagavān svāśrayaḥ paraḥ BhP_06.05.012/2 tamadṛṣṭvābhavaṃ puṃsaḥ kimasatkarmabhirbhavet
GP10bhp_06u:327: BhP_06.05.013/1 pumān naivaiti yadgatvā bilasvargaṃ gato yathā
GP10bhp_06u:330: BhP_06.05.014/2 tanniṣṭhāmagatasyeha kimasatkarmabhirbhavet BhP_06.05.015/1 tatsaṅgabhraṃśitaiśvaryaṃ saṃsarantaṃ kubhāryavat
GP10bhp_06u:331: BhP_06.05.015/2 tadgatīrabudhasyeha kimasatkarmabhirbhavet BhP_06.05.016/1 sṛṣṭyapyayakarīṃ māyāṃ velākūlāntavegitām
GP10bhp_06u:334: BhP_06.05.017/2 adhyātmamabudhasyeha kimasatkarmabhirbhavet BhP_06.05.018/1 aiśvaraṃ śāstramutsṛjya
GP10bhp_06u:335: BhP_06.05.018/2 viviktapadamajñāya kimasatkarmabhirbhavet BhP_06.05.019/1 kālacakraṃ bhrami tīkṣṇaṃ sarvaṃ niṣkarṣayaj jagat
GP10bhp_06u:336: BhP_06.05.019/2 svatantramabudhasyeha kimasatkarmabhirbhavet BhP_06.05.020/1 śāstrasya piturādeśaṃ yo na veda nivartakam
GP10bhp_06u:338: BhP_06.05.021/1 iti vyavasitā rājan haryaśvā ekacetasaḥ BhP_06.05.021/2 prayayustaṃ parikramya
GP10bhp_06u:340: BhP_06.05.022/2 akhaṇḍaṃ cittamāveśya lokān anucaran muniḥ BhP_06.05.023/1 nāśaṃ niśamya putrāṇāṃ nāradāc chīlaśālinām BhP_06.05.023/2 anvatapyata kaḥ śocan suprajastvaṃ śucāṃ padam
GP10bhp_06u:343: BhP_06.05.025/1 te ca pitrā samādiṣṭāḥ prajāsarge dhṛtavratāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:345: BhP_06.05.026/1 tadupasparśanādeva vinirdhūtamalāśayāḥ BhP_06.05.026/2 japanto brahma paramaṃ tepustatra mahat tapaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:348: BhP_06.05.028/1 oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya puruṣāya mahātmane BhP_06.05.028/2 viśuddhasattvadhiṣṇyāya mahāhaṃsāya dhīmahi
GP10bhp_06u:349: BhP_06.05.029/1 iti tān api rājendra prajāsargadhiyo muniḥ
GP10bhp_06u:350: BhP_06.05.029/2 upetya nāradaḥ prāha vācaḥ kūṭāni pūrvavat
GP10bhp_06u:351: BhP_06.05.030/1 dākṣāyaṇāḥ saṃśṛṇuta gadato nigamaṃ mama BhP_06.05.030/2 anvicchatānupadavīṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ bhrātṛvatsalāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:352: BhP_06.05.031/1 bhrātṝṇāṃ prāyaṇaṃ bhrātā yo 'nutiṣṭhati dharmavit
GP10bhp_06u:353: BhP_06.05.031/2 sa puṇyabandhuḥ puruṣo marudbhiḥ saha modate
GP10bhp_06u:355: BhP_06.05.032/2 te 'pi cānvagaman mārgaṃ bhrātṝṇāmeva māriṣa
GP10bhp_06u:357: BhP_06.05.033/2 nādyāpi te nivartante paścimā yāminīriva BhP_06.05.034/1 etasmin kāla utpātān bahūn paśyan prajāpatiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:360: BhP_06.05.035/2 devarṣimupalabhyāha roṣādvisphuritādharaḥ BhP_06.05.036/0 śrīdakṣa uvāca BhP_06.05.036/1 aho asādho sādhūnāṃ sādhuliṅgena nastvayā BhP_06.05.036/2 asādhvakāry arbhakāṇāṃ bhikṣormārgaḥ pradarśitaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:362: BhP_06.05.037/2 vighātaḥ śreyasaḥ pāpa lokayorubhayoḥ kṛtaḥ BhP_06.05.038/1 evaṃ tvaṃ niranukrośo bālānāṃ matibhiddhareḥ BhP_06.05.038/2 pārṣadamadhye carasi yaśohā nirapatrapaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:364: BhP_06.05.039/2 ṛte tvāṃ sauhṛdaghnaṃ vai vairaṅkaramavairiṇām BhP_06.05.040/1 netthaṃ puṃsāṃ virāgaḥ syāt tvayā kevalinā mṛṣā
GP10bhp_06u:366: BhP_06.05.041/1 nānubhūya na jānāti pumān viṣayatīkṣṇatām BhP_06.05.041/2 nirvidyate svayaṃ tasmān na tathā bhinnadhīḥ paraiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:367: BhP_06.05.042/1 yan nastvaṃ karmasandhānāṃ sādhūnāṃ gṛhamedhinām BhP_06.05.042/2 kṛtavān asi durmarṣaṃ vipriyaṃ tava marṣitam
GP10bhp_06u:369: BhP_06.05.043/2 tasmāl lokeṣu te mūḍha na bhavedbhramataḥ padam
GP10bhp_06u:370: BhP_06.05.044/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.05.044/1 pratijagrāha tadbāḍhaṃ nāradaḥ sādhusammataḥ
GP10bhp_06u:371: BhP_06.05.044/2 etāvān sādhuvādo hi titikṣeteśvaraḥ svayam BhP_06.06.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.06.001/2 tataḥ prācetaso 'siknyāmanunītaḥ svayambhuvā
GP10bhp_06u:373: BhP_06.06.002/2 daśa dharmāya kāyādāddviṣaṭ triṇava cendave BhP_06.06.003/1 bhūtāṅgiraḥkṛśāśvebhyo dve dve tārkṣyāya cāparāḥ BhP_06.06.003/2 nāmadheyāny amūṣāṃ tvaṃ sāpatyānāṃ ca me śṛṇu
GP10bhp_06u:376: BhP_06.06.005/1 vasurmuhūrtā saṅkalpā dharmapatnyaḥ sutāñ śṛṇu BhP_06.06.005/2 bhānostu devaṛṣabha indrasenastato nṛpa
GP10bhp_06u:379: BhP_06.06.007/1 bhuvo durgāṇi yāmeyaḥ svargo nandistato 'bhavat
GP10bhp_06u:383: BhP_06.06.009/1 jayanto vāsudevāṃśa upendra iti yaṃ viduḥ
GP10bhp_06u:385: BhP_06.06.010/1 ye vai phalaṃ prayacchanti bhūtānāṃ svasvakālajam
GP10bhp_06u:386: BhP_06.06.010/2 saṅkalpāyāstu saṅkalpaḥ kāmaḥ saṅkalpajaḥ smṛtaḥ BhP_06.06.011/1 vasavo 'ṣṭau vasoḥ putrāsteṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu BhP_06.06.011/2 droṇaḥ prāṇo dhruvo 'rko 'gnirdoṣo vāsturvibhāvasuḥ
GP10bhp_06u:388: BhP_06.06.012/2 prāṇasyorjasvatī bhāryā saha āyuḥ purojavaḥ BhP_06.06.013/1 dhruvasya bhāryā dharaṇirasūta vividhāḥ puraḥ BhP_06.06.013/2 arkasya vāsanā bhāryā putrāstarṣādayaḥ smṛtāḥ BhP_06.06.014/1 agnerbhāryā vasordhārā putrā draviṇakādayaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:390: BhP_06.06.015/1 doṣasya śarvarīputraḥ śiśumāro hareḥ kalā BhP_06.06.015/2 vāstorāṅgirasīputro viśvakarmākṛtīpatiḥ BhP_06.06.016/1 tato manuścākṣuṣo 'bhūdviśve sādhyā manoḥ sutāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:392: BhP_06.06.017/1 pañcayāmo 'tha bhūtāni yena jāgrati karmasu
GP10bhp_06u:393: BhP_06.06.017/2 sarūpāsūta bhūtasya bhāryā rudrāṃśca koṭiśaḥ BhP_06.06.018/1 raivato 'jo bhavo bhīmo vāma ugro vṛṣākapiḥ BhP_06.06.018/2 ajaikapādahirbradhno bahurūpo mahān iti
GP10bhp_06u:395: BhP_06.06.019/2 prajāpateraṅgirasaḥ svadhā patnī pitṝn atha BhP_06.06.020/1 atharvāṅgirasaṃ vedaṃ putratve cākarot satī BhP_06.06.020/2 kṛśāśvo 'rciṣi bhāryāyāṃ dhūmaketumajījanat BhP_06.06.021/1 dhiṣaṇāyāṃ vedaśiro devalaṃ vayunaṃ manum BhP_06.06.021/2 tārkṣyasya vinatā kadrūḥ pataṅgī yāminīti ca
GP10bhp_06u:396: BhP_06.06.022/1 pataṅgy asūta patagān yāminī śalabhān atha
GP10bhp_06u:399: BhP_06.06.023/1 kṛttikādīni nakṣatrāṇ īndoḥ patnyastu bhārata BhP_06.06.023/2 dakṣaśāpāt so 'napatyastāsu yakṣmagrahārditaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:400: BhP_06.06.024/1 punaḥ prasādya taṃ somaḥ kalā lebhe kṣaye ditāḥ BhP_06.06.024/2 śṛṇu nāmāni lokānāṃ mātṝṇāṃ śaṅkarāṇi ca
GP10bhp_06u:402: BhP_06.06.025/2 aditirditirdanuḥ kāṣṭhā ariṣṭā surasā ilā BhP_06.06.026/1 muniḥ krodhavaśā tāmrā surabhiḥ saramā timiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:404: BhP_06.06.027/1 surabhermahiṣā gāvo ye cānye dviśaphā nṛpa
GP10bhp_06u:407: BhP_06.06.028/2 ilāyā bhūruhāḥ sarve yātudhānāśca saurasāḥ BhP_06.06.029/1 ariṣṭāyāstu gandharvāḥ kāṣṭhāyā dviśaphetarāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:409: BhP_06.06.030/1 dvimūrdhā śambaro 'riṣṭo hayagrīvo vibhāvasuḥ BhP_06.06.030/2 ayomukhaḥ śaṅkuśirāḥ svarbhānuḥ kapilo 'ruṇaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:412: BhP_06.06.032/1 svarbhānoḥ suprabhāṃ kanyāmuvāha namuciḥ kila BhP_06.06.032/2 vṛṣaparvaṇastu śarmiṣṭhāṃ yayātirnāhuṣo balī
GP10bhp_06u:414: BhP_06.06.033/2 upadānavī hayaśirā pulomā kālakā tathā BhP_06.06.034/1 upadānavīṃ hiraṇyākṣaḥ kraturhayaśirāṃ nṛpa
GP10bhp_06u:415: BhP_06.06.034/2 pulomāṃ kālakāṃ ca dve vaiśvānarasute tu kaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:418: BhP_06.06.036/1 tayoḥ ṣaṣṭisahasrāṇi yajñaghnāṃste pituḥ pitā BhP_06.06.036/2 jaghāna svargato rājanneka indrapriyaṅkaraḥ
GP10bhp_06u:420: BhP_06.06.037/2 rāhujyeṣṭhaṃ ketuśataṃ grahatvaṃ ya upāgatāḥ BhP_06.06.038/1 athātaḥ śrūyatāṃ vaṃśo yo 'diteranupūrvaśaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:422: BhP_06.06.039/1 vivasvān aryamā pūṣā tvaṣṭātha savitā bhagaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:423: BhP_06.06.039/2 dhātā vidhātā varuṇo mitraḥ śatru urukramaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:424: BhP_06.06.040/1 vivasvataḥ śrāddhadevaṃ saṃjñāsūyata vai manum BhP_06.06.040/2 mithunaṃ ca mahābhāgā yamaṃ devaṃ yamīṃ tathā
GP10bhp_06u:425: BhP_06.06.040/3 saiva bhūtvātha vaḍavā nāsatyau suṣuve bhuvi
GP10bhp_06u:426: BhP_06.06.041/1 chāyā śanaiścaraṃ lebhe sāvarṇiṃ ca manuṃ tataḥ
GP10bhp_06u:427: BhP_06.06.041/2 kanyāṃ ca tapatīṃ yā vai vavre saṃvaraṇaṃ patim BhP_06.06.042/1 aryamṇo mātṛkā patnī tayoścarṣaṇayaḥ sutāḥ BhP_06.06.042/2 yatra vai mānuṣī jātirbrahmaṇā copakalpitā BhP_06.06.043/1 pūṣānapatyaḥ piṣṭādo bhagnadanto 'bhavat purā
GP10bhp_06u:428: BhP_06.06.043/2 yo 'sau dakṣāya kupitaṃ jahāsa vivṛtadvijaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:429: BhP_06.06.044/1 tvaṣṭurdaityātmajā bhāryā racanā nāma kanyakā BhP_06.06.044/2 sanniveśastayorjajñe viśvarūpaśca vīryavān
GP10bhp_06u:430: BhP_06.06.045/1 taṃ vavrire suragaṇā svasrīyaṃ dviṣatāmapi BhP_06.06.045/2 vimatena parityaktā guruṇāṅgirasena yat
GP10bhp_06u:432: BhP_06.07.001/1 kasya hetoḥ parityaktā ācāryeṇātmanaḥ surāḥ BhP_06.07.001/2 etadācakṣva bhagavañ chiṣyāṇāmakramaṃ gurau
GP10bhp_06u:434: BhP_06.07.002/1 indrastribhuvanaiśvarya madollaṅghitasatpathaḥ BhP_06.07.002/2 marudbhirvasubhī rudrairādityairṛbhubhirnṛpa BhP_06.07.003/1 viśvedevaiśca sādhyaiśca nāsatyābhyāṃ pariśritaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:438: BhP_06.07.005/1 upagīyamāno lalitamāsthānādhyāsanāśritaḥ BhP_06.07.005/2 pāṇḍureṇātapatreṇa candramaṇḍalacāruṇā BhP_06.07.006/1 yuktaścānyaiḥ pārameṣṭhyaiścāmaravyajanādibhiḥ BhP_06.07.006/2 virājamānaḥ paulamyā sahārdhāsanayā bhṛśam
GP10bhp_06u:439: BhP_06.07.007/1 sa yadā paramācāryaṃ devānāmātmanaśca ha BhP_06.07.007/2 nābhyanandata samprāptaṃ pratyutthānāsanādibhiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:442: BhP_06.07.009/1 tato nirgatya sahasā kavirāṅgirasaḥ prabhuḥ BhP_06.07.009/2 āyayau svagṛhaṃ tūṣṇīṃ vidvān śrīmadavikriyām BhP_06.07.010/1 tarhy eva pratibudhyendro guruhelanamātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:444: BhP_06.07.011/1 aho bata mayāsādhu kṛtaṃ vai dabhrabuddhinā
GP10bhp_06u:445: BhP_06.07.011/2 yan mayaiśvaryamattena guruḥ sadasi kātkṛtaḥ BhP_06.07.012/1 ko gṛdhyet paṇḍito lakṣmīṃ tripiṣṭapapaterapi BhP_06.07.012/2 yayāhamāsuraṃ bhāvaṃ nīto 'dya vibudheśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_06u:446: BhP_06.07.013/1 yaḥ pārameṣṭhyaṃ dhiṣaṇamadhitiṣṭhan na kañcana BhP_06.07.013/2 pratyuttiṣṭhediti brūyurdharmaṃ te na paraṃ viduḥ
GP10bhp_06u:447: BhP_06.07.014/1 teṣāṃ kupathadeṣṭṝṇāṃ patatāṃ tamasi hy adhaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:448: BhP_06.07.014/2 ye śraddadhyurvacaste vai majjanty aśmaplavā iva
GP10bhp_06u:449: BhP_06.07.015/1 athāhamamarācāryamagādhadhiṣaṇaṃ dvijam BhP_06.07.015/2 prasādayiṣye niśaṭhaḥ śīrṣṇā taccaraṇaṃ spṛśan BhP_06.07.016/1 evaṃ cintayatastasya maghono bhagavān gṛhāt BhP_06.07.016/2 bṛhaspatirgato 'dṛṣṭāṃ gatimadhyātmamāyayā
GP10bhp_06u:450: BhP_06.07.017/1 gurornādhigataḥ saṃjñāṃ parīkṣan bhagavān svarāṭ BhP_06.07.017/2 dhyāyan dhiyā surairyuktaḥ śarma nālabhatātmanaḥ BhP_06.07.018/1 tac chrutvaivāsurāḥ sarva āśrityauśanasaṃ matam BhP_06.07.018/2 devān pratyudyamaṃ cakrurdurmadā ātatāyinaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:452: BhP_06.07.019/2 brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmuḥ sahendrā natakandharāḥ BhP_06.07.020/1 tāṃstathābhyarditān vīkṣya bhagavān ātmabhūrajaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:453: BhP_06.07.020/2 kṛpayā parayā deva uvāca parisāntvayan BhP_06.07.021/0 śrībrahmovāca
GP10bhp_06u:454: BhP_06.07.021/1 aho bata suraśreṣṭhā hy abhadraṃ vaḥ kṛtaṃ mahat BhP_06.07.021/2 brahmiṣṭhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ dāntamaiśvaryān nābhyanandata
GP10bhp_06u:456: BhP_06.07.022/2 prakṣīṇebhyaḥ svavairibhyaḥ samṛddhānāṃ ca yat surāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:457: BhP_06.07.023/1 maghavan dviṣataḥ paśya prakṣīṇān gurvatikramāt BhP_06.07.023/2 sampraty upacitān bhūyaḥ kāvyamārādhya bhaktitaḥ BhP_06.07.023/3 ādadīran nilayanaṃ mamāpi bhṛgudevatāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:458: BhP_06.07.024/1 tripiṣṭapaṃ kiṃ gaṇayanty abhedya mantrā bhṛgūṇāmanuśikṣitārthāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:459: BhP_06.07.024/2 na vipragovindagavīśvarāṇāṃ bhavanty abhadrāṇi nareśvarāṇām BhP_06.07.025/1 tadviśvarūpaṃ bhajatāśu vipraṃ tapasvinaṃ tvāṣṭramathātmavantam BhP_06.07.025/2 sabhājito 'rthān sa vidhāsyate vo yadi kṣamiṣyadhvamutāsya karma
GP10bhp_06u:460: BhP_06.07.026/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.07.026/1 ta evamuditā rājan brahmaṇā vigatajvarāḥ BhP_06.07.026/2 ṛṣiṃ tvāṣṭramupavrajya pariṣvajyedamabruvan
GP10bhp_06u:461: BhP_06.07.027/0 śrīdevā ūcuḥ BhP_06.07.027/1 vayaṃ te 'tithayaḥ prāptā āśramaṃ bhadramastu
GP10bhp_06u:462: BhP_06.07.027/2 kāmaḥ sampādyatāṃ tāta pitṝṇāṃ samayocitaḥ BhP_06.07.028/1 putrāṇāṃ hi paro dharmaḥ pitṛśuśrūṣaṇaṃ satām
GP10bhp_06u:463: BhP_06.07.028/2 api putravatāṃ brahman kimuta brahmacāriṇām BhP_06.07.029/1 ācāryo brahmaṇo mūrtiḥ pitā mūrtiḥ prajāpateḥ
GP10bhp_06u:469: BhP_06.07.032/1 vṛṇīmahe tvopādhyāyaṃ brahmiṣṭhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gurum BhP_06.07.032/2 yathāñjasā vijeṣyāmaḥ sapatnāṃstava tejasā
GP10bhp_06u:470: BhP_06.07.033/1 na garhayanti hy artheṣu yaviṣṭhāṅghryabhivādanam BhP_06.07.033/2 chandobhyo 'nyatra na brahman vayo jyaiṣṭhyasya kāraṇam BhP_06.07.034/0 śrīṛṣiruvāca
GP10bhp_06u:472: BhP_06.07.034/2 sa viśvarūpastān āha prasannaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā
GP10bhp_06u:473: BhP_06.07.035/0 śrīviśvarūpa uvāca BhP_06.07.035/1 vigarhitaṃ dharmaśīlairbrahmavarcaupavyayam BhP_06.07.035/2 kathaṃ nu madvidho nāthā lokeśairabhiyācitam BhP_06.07.035/3 pratyākhyāsyati tacchiṣyaḥ sa eva svārtha ucyate
GP10bhp_06u:474: BhP_06.07.036/1 akiñcanānāṃ hi dhanaṃ śiloñchanaṃ teneha nirvartitasādhusatkriyaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:475: BhP_06.07.036/2 kathaṃ vigarhyaṃ nu karomy adhīśvarāḥ paurodhasaṃ hṛṣyati yena durmatiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:476: BhP_06.07.037/1 tathāpi na pratibrūyāṃ gurubhiḥ prārthitaṃ kiyat
GP10bhp_06u:477: BhP_06.07.037/2 bhavatāṃ prārthitaṃ sarvaṃ prāṇairarthaiśca sādhaye BhP_06.07.038/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
GP10bhp_06u:478: BhP_06.07.038/1 tebhya evaṃ pratiśrutya viśvarūpo mahātapāḥ BhP_06.07.038/2 paurahityaṃ vṛtaścakre parameṇa samādhinā
GP10bhp_06u:480: BhP_06.07.039/2 ācchidyādān mahendrāya vaiṣṇavyā vidyayā vibhuḥ BhP_06.07.040/1 yayā guptaḥ sahasrākṣo jigye 'suracamūrvibhuḥ
GP10bhp_06u:481: BhP_06.07.040/2 tāṃ prāha sa mahendrāya viśvarūpa udāradhīḥ
GP10bhp_06u:483: BhP_06.08.001/1 yayā guptaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ savāhān ripusainikān BhP_06.08.001/2 krīḍanniva vinirjitya trilokyā bubhuje śriyam BhP_06.08.002/1 bhagavaṃstan mamākhyāhi varma nārāyaṇātmakam
GP10bhp_06u:484: BhP_06.08.002/2 yathātatāyinaḥ śatrūn yena gupto 'jayan mṛdhe
GP10bhp_06u:488: BhP_06.08.004/0 śrīviśvarūpa uvāca BhP_06.08.004/1 dhautāṅghripāṇirācamya sapavitra udaṅmukhaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:493: BhP_06.08.006/2 oṃ namo nārāyaṇāyeti viparyayamathāpi vā BhP_06.08.007/1 karanyāsaṃ tataḥ
GP10bhp_06u:496: BhP_06.08.008/2 ṣakāraṃ tu bhruvormadhye ṇakāraṃ śikhayā nyaset
GP10bhp_06u:498: BhP_06.08.009/2 makāramastramuddiśya mantramūrtirbhavedbudhaḥ BhP_06.08.010/1 savisargaṃ phaḍantaṃ tat sarvadikṣu vinirdiśet BhP_06.08.010/2 oṃ viṣṇave nama iti
GP10bhp_06u:500: BhP_06.08.011/2 vidyātejastapomūrtimimaṃ mantramudāharet BhP_06.08.012/1 oṃ harirvidadhyān mama sarvarakṣāṃ nyastāṅghripadmaḥ patagendrapṛṣṭhe
GP10bhp_06u:502: BhP_06.08.013/1 jaleṣu māṃ rakṣatu matsyamūrtir yādogaṇebhyo varuṇasya
GP10bhp_06u:508: BhP_06.08.014/2 vimuñcato yasya mahāṭṭahāsaṃ diśo vinedurnyapataṃśca garbhāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:509: BhP_06.08.015/1 rakṣatvasau mādhvani yajñakalpaḥ svadaṃṣṭrayonnītadharo varāhaḥ BhP_06.08.015/2 rāmo 'drikūṭeṣvatha vipravāse salakṣmaṇo 'vyādbharatāgrajo
GP10bhp_06u:511: BhP_06.08.016/1 māmugradharmādakhilāt pramādān nārāyaṇaḥ pātu naraśca hāsāt
GP10bhp_06u:512: BhP_06.08.016/2 dattastvayogādatha yoganāthaḥ pāyādguṇeśaḥ kapilaḥ karmabandhāt BhP_06.08.017/1 sanatkumāro 'vatu kāmadevād dhayaśīrṣā māṃ pathi devahelanāt BhP_06.08.017/2 devarṣivaryaḥ puruṣārcanāntarāt kūrmo harirmāṃ nirayādaśeṣāt BhP_06.08.018/1 dhanvantarirbhagavān pātvapathyād dvandvādbhayādṛṣabho
GP10bhp_06u:514: BhP_06.08.018/2 yajñaśca lokādavatāj janāntād balo gaṇāt krodhavaśādahīndraḥ
GP10bhp_06u:515: BhP_06.08.019/1 dvaipāyano bhagavān aprabodhād buddhastu pāṣaṇḍagaṇapramādāt BhP_06.08.019/2 kalkiḥ kaleḥ kālamalāt prapātu dharmāvanāyorukṛtāvatāraḥ BhP_06.08.020/1 māṃ keśavo gadayā prātaravyād govinda āsaṅgavamāttaveṇuḥ
GP10bhp_06u:516: BhP_06.08.020/2 nārāyaṇaḥ prāhṇa udāttaśaktir madhyandine viṣṇurarīndrapāṇiḥ BhP_06.08.021/1 devo 'parāhṇe madhuhogradhanvā sāyaṃ tridhāmāvatu mādhavo mām BhP_06.08.021/2 doṣe hṛṣīkeśa utārdharātre niśītha eko 'vatu padmanābhaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:523: BhP_06.08.023/2 dandagdhi dandagdhy arisainyamāśu kakṣaṃ yathā vātasakho
GP10bhp_06u:530: BhP_06.08.026/1 tvaṃ tigmadhārāsivarārisainyam īśaprayukto mama chindhi chindhi
GP10bhp_06u:531: BhP_06.08.026/2 cakṣūṃṣi carman chatacandra chādaya dviṣāmaghonāṃ hara
GP10bhp_06u:533: BhP_06.08.027/1 yan no bhayaṃ grahebhyo 'bhūt ketubhyo nṛbhya eva ca
GP10bhp_06u:534: BhP_06.08.027/2 sarīsṛpebhyo daṃṣṭribhyo bhūtebhyo 'ṃhobhya eva ca BhP_06.08.028/1 sarvāṇy etāni bhagavan nāmarūpānukīrtanāt
GP10bhp_06u:535: BhP_06.08.028/2 prayāntu saṅkṣayaṃ sadyo ye naḥ śreyaḥpratīpakāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:536: BhP_06.08.029/1 garuḍo bhagavān stotra stobhaśchandomayaḥ prabhuḥ BhP_06.08.029/2 rakṣatvaśeṣakṛcchrebhyo viṣvaksenaḥ svanāmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:539: BhP_06.08.031/1 yathā hi bhagavān eva vastutaḥ sadasac ca yat BhP_06.08.031/2 satyenānena naḥ sarve yāntu nāśamupadravāḥ BhP_06.08.032/1 yathaikātmyānubhāvānāṃ vikalparahitaḥ svayam
GP10bhp_06u:541: BhP_06.08.033/1 tenaiva satyamānena sarvajño bhagavān hariḥ BhP_06.08.033/2 pātu sarvaiḥ svarūpairnaḥ sadā sarvatra sarvagaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:542: BhP_06.08.034/1 vidikṣu dikṣūrdhvamadhaḥ samantād antarbahirbhagavān nārasiṃhaḥ BhP_06.08.034/2 prahāpaya lokabhayaṃ svanena svatejasā grastasamastatejāḥ BhP_06.08.035/1 maghavannidamākhyātaṃ varma nārāyaṇātmakam
GP10bhp_06u:544: BhP_06.08.036/1 etaddhārayamāṇastu yaṃ yaṃ paśyati cakṣuṣā BhP_06.08.036/2 padā vā saṃspṛśet sadyaḥ sādhvasāt sa vimucyate
GP10bhp_06u:545: BhP_06.08.037/1 na kutaścidbhayaṃ tasya vidyāṃ dhārayato bhavet
GP10bhp_06u:547: BhP_06.08.038/1 imāṃ vidyāṃ purā kaścit kauśiko dhārayan dvijaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:548: BhP_06.08.038/2 yogadhāraṇayā svāṅgaṃ jahau sa marudhanvani BhP_06.08.039/1 tasyopari vimānena
GP10bhp_06u:549: BhP_06.08.039/2 yayau citrarathaḥ strībhirvṛto yatra dvijakṣayaḥ BhP_06.08.040/1 gaganān nyapatat sadyaḥ savimāno hy avākśirāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:551: BhP_06.08.040/3 prāsya prācīsarasvatyāṃ snātvā dhāma svamanvagāt BhP_06.08.041/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.08.041/1 ya idaṃ śṛṇuyāt kāle yo dhārayati cādṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:552: BhP_06.08.041/2 taṃ namasyanti bhūtāni mucyate sarvato bhayāt
GP10bhp_06u:555: BhP_06.09.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.09.001/1 tasyāsan viśvarūpasya śirāṃsi trīṇi bhārata BhP_06.09.001/2 somapīthaṃ surāpīthamannādamiti śuśruma
GP10bhp_06u:556: BhP_06.09.002/1 sa vai barhiṣi devebhyo bhāgaṃ pratyakṣamuccakaiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:557: BhP_06.09.002/2 adadadyasya pitaro devāḥ sapraśrayaṃ nṛpa BhP_06.09.003/1 sa eva hi dadau bhāgaṃ parokṣamasurān prati
GP10bhp_06u:561: BhP_06.09.005/1 somapīthaṃ tu yat tasya śira āsīt kapiñjalaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:562: BhP_06.09.005/2 kalaviṅkaḥ surāpīthamannādaṃ yat sa tittiriḥ BhP_06.09.006/1 brahmahatyāmañjalinā jagrāha yadapīśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_06u:563: BhP_06.09.006/2 saṃvatsarānte tadaghaṃ bhūtānāṃ sa viśuddhaye BhP_06.09.006/3 bhūmyambudrumayoṣidbhyaścaturdhā vyabhajaddhariḥ BhP_06.09.007/1 bhūmisturīyaṃ jagrāha khātapūravareṇa vai
GP10bhp_06u:564: BhP_06.09.007/2 īriṇaṃ brahmahatyāyā rūpaṃ bhūmau pradṛśyate BhP_06.09.008/1 turyaṃ chedaviroheṇa vareṇa jagṛhurdrumāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:567: BhP_06.09.009/2 rajorūpeṇa tāsvaṃho māsi māsi pradṛśyate BhP_06.09.010/1 dravyabhūyovareṇāpasturīyaṃ jagṛhurmalam BhP_06.09.010/2 tāsu budbudaphenābhyāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ taddharati kṣipan BhP_06.09.011/1 hataputrastatastvaṣṭā juhāvendrāya śatrave
GP10bhp_06u:568: BhP_06.09.011/2 indraśatro vivardhasva mā ciraṃ jahi vidviṣam
GP10bhp_06u:569: BhP_06.09.012/1 athānvāhāryapacanādutthito ghoradarśanaḥ BhP_06.09.012/2 kṛtānta iva lokānāṃ yugāntasamaye yathā BhP_06.09.013/1 viṣvag vivardhamānaṃ tamiṣumātraṃ dine dine BhP_06.09.013/2 dagdhaśailapratīkāśaṃ sandhyābhrānīkavarcasam BhP_06.09.014/1 taptatāmraśikhāśmaśruṃ madhyāhnārkogralocanam BhP_06.09.015/1 dedīpyamāne triśikhe śūla āropya rodasī BhP_06.09.015/2 nṛtyantamunnadantaṃ ca cālayantaṃ padā mahīm BhP_06.09.016/1 darīgambhīravaktreṇa pibatā ca nabhastalam
GP10bhp_06u:572: BhP_06.09.017/2 vitrastā dudruvurlokā vīkṣya sarve diśo daśa
GP10bhp_06u:574: BhP_06.09.018/2 sa vai vṛtra iti proktaḥ pāpaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:576: BhP_06.09.019/2 svaiḥ svairdivyāstraśastraughaiḥ so 'grasat tāni kṛtsnaśaḥ BhP_06.09.020/1 tataste vismitāḥ sarve viṣaṇṇā grastatejasaḥ BhP_06.09.020/2 pratyañcamādipuruṣamupatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ BhP_06.09.021/0 śrīdevā ūcuḥ BhP_06.09.021/1 vāyvambarāgnyapkṣitayastrilokā brahmādayo ye
GP10bhp_06u:578: BhP_06.09.021/2 harāma yasmai balimantako 'sau bibheti yasmādaraṇaṃ tato
GP10bhp_06u:580: BhP_06.09.022/1 avismitaṃ taṃ paripūrṇakāmaṃ svenaiva lābhena samaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:582: BhP_06.09.022/2 vinopasarpaty aparaṃ hi bāliśaḥ śvalāṅgulenātititarti sindhum
GP10bhp_06u:583: BhP_06.09.023/1 yasyoruśṛṅge jagatīṃ svanāvaṃ manuryathābadhya tatāra durgam
GP10bhp_06u:584: BhP_06.09.023/2 sa eva nastvāṣṭrabhayāddurantāt trātāśritān vāricaro 'pi
GP10bhp_06u:586: BhP_06.09.024/1 purā svayambhūrapi saṃyamāmbhasy udīrṇavātormiravaiḥ karāle BhP_06.09.024/2 eko 'ravindāt patitastatāra tasmādbhayādyena sa no 'stu
GP10bhp_06u:588: BhP_06.09.025/1 ya eka īśo nijamāyayā naḥ sasarja yenānusṛjāma viśvam BhP_06.09.025/2 vayaṃ na yasyāpi puraḥ samīhataḥ paśyāma liṅgaṃ pṛthag īśamāninaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:589: BhP_06.09.026/1 yo naḥ sapatnairbhṛśamardyamānān devarṣitiryaṅnṛṣu nitya eva
GP10bhp_06u:590: BhP_06.09.026/2 kṛtāvatārastanubhiḥ svamāyayā kṛtvātmasāt pāti yuge yuge
GP10bhp_06u:592: BhP_06.09.027/1 tameva devaṃ vayamātmadaivataṃ paraṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:594: BhP_06.09.027/2 vrajāma sarve śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ svānāṃ sa no dhāsyati śaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:596: BhP_06.09.028/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.09.028/1 iti teṣāṃ mahārāja surāṇāmupatiṣṭhatām
GP10bhp_06u:599: BhP_06.09.029/2 paryupāsitamunnidra śaradamburuhekṣaṇam BhP_06.09.030/1 dṛṣṭvā tamavanau sarva īkṣaṇāhlādaviklavāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:600: BhP_06.09.030/2 daṇḍavat patitā rājañ chanairutthāya tuṣṭuvuḥ BhP_06.09.031/0 śrīdevā ūcuḥ BhP_06.09.031/1 namaste yajñavīryāya vayase uta te namaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:601: BhP_06.09.031/2 namaste hy astacakrāya namaḥ supuruhūtaye BhP_06.09.032/1 yat te gatīnāṃ tisṛṇāmīśituḥ paramaṃ padam
GP10bhp_06u:603: BhP_06.09.033/1 oṃ namaste 'stu bhagavan nārāyaṇa vāsudevādipuruṣa
GP10bhp_06u:604: mahāpuruṣa mahānubhāva paramamaṅgala paramakalyāṇa paramakāruṇika kevala jagadādhāra lokaikanātha sarveśvara lakṣmīnātha paramahaṃsaparivrājakaiḥ parameṇātmayogasamādhinā paribhāvitaparisphuṭapāramahaṃsyadharmeṇodghāṭitatamaḥkapāṭadvāre citte
GP10bhp_06u:606: BhP_06.09.034/1 duravabodha iva tavāyaṃ vihārayogo yadaśaraṇo 'śarīra
GP10bhp_06u:607: idamanavekṣitāsmatsamavāya ātmanaivāvikriyamāṇena saguṇamaguṇaḥ sṛjasi pāsi harasi
GP10bhp_06u:608: BhP_06.09.035/1 atha tatra bhavān kiṃ devadattavadiha guṇavisargapatitaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:609: pāratantryeṇa svakṛtakuśalākuśalaṃ phalamupādadāty āhosvidātmārāma upaśamaśīlaḥ samañjasadarśana udāsta iti ha vāva na vidāmaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:610: BhP_06.09.036/1 na hi virodha ubhayaṃ bhagavaty aparimitaguṇagaṇa īśvare
GP10bhp_06u:613: vivādānavasara uparatasamastamāyāmaye kevala evātmamāyāmantardhāya ko nvartho durghaṭa iva bhavati svarūpadvayābhāvāt BhP_06.09.037/1 samaviṣamamatīnāṃ matamanusarasi yathā rajjukhaṇḍaḥ sarpādidhiyām BhP_06.09.038/1 sa eva hi punaḥ sarvavastuni vastusvarūpaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sakalajagatkāraṇakāraṇabhūtaḥ sarvapratyagātmatvāt sarvaguṇābhāsopalakṣita eka eva paryavaśeṣitaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:614: BhP_06.09.039/1 atha ha vāva tava mahimāmṛtarasasamudravipruṣā sakṛdavalīḍhayā svamanasi
GP10bhp_06u:615: vismāritadṛṣṭaśrutaviṣayasukhaleśābhāsāḥ paramabhāgavatā ekāntino bhagavati sarvabhūtapriyasuhṛdi sarvātmani nitarāṃ nirantaraṃ nirvṛtamanasaḥ kathamu ha vā ete madhumathana punaḥ svārthakuśalā hy ātmapriyasuhṛdaḥ sādhavastvaccaraṇāmbujānusevāṃ visṛjanti na yatra punarayaṃ saṃsāraparyāvartaḥ BhP_06.09.040/1 tribhuvanātmabhavana trivikrama trinayana
GP10bhp_06u:616: trilokamanoharānubhāva tavaiva vibhūtayo ditijadanujādayaścāpi teṣāmupakramasamayo 'yamiti svātmamāyayā suranaramṛgamiśritajalacarākṛtibhiryathāparādhaṃ daṇḍaṃ daṇḍadhara dadhartha evamenamapi bhagavan jahi tvāṣṭramuta yadi manyase BhP_06.09.041/1 asmākaṃ tāvakānāṃ tatatata natānāṃ hare tava
GP10bhp_06u:618: BhP_06.09.042/1 atha bhagavaṃstavāsmābhirakhilajagadutpattisthitilayanimittāyamānadivyamāyāvinodasya sakalajīvanikāyānāmantarhṛdayeṣu bahirapi ca brahmapratyagātmasvarūpeṇa pradhānarūpeṇa ca yathādeśakāladehāvasthānaviśeṣaṃ tadupādānopalambhakatayānubhavataḥ sarvapratyayasākṣiṇa ākāśaśarīrasya sākṣāt parabrahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ kiyān iha vārthaviśeṣo vijñāpanīyaḥ syādvisphuliṅgādibhiriva hiraṇyaretasaḥ BhP_06.09.043/1 ata eva svayaṃ tadupakalpayāsmākaṃ bhagavataḥ paramagurostava caraṇaśatapalāśacchāyāṃ vividhavṛjinasaṃsārapariśramopaśamanīmupasṛtānāṃ vayaṃ yatkāmenopasāditāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:619: BhP_06.09.044/1 atho īśa jahi tvāṣṭraṃ grasantaṃ bhuvanatrayam
GP10bhp_06u:620: BhP_06.09.044/2 grastāni yena naḥ kṛṣṇa tejāṃsy astrāyudhāni ca
GP10bhp_06u:621: BhP_06.09.045/1 haṃsāya dahranilayāya nirīkṣakāya kṛṣṇāya mṛṣṭayaśase nirupakramāya
GP10bhp_06u:622: BhP_06.09.045/2 satsaṅgrahāya bhavapānthanijāśramāptāv ante parīṣṭagataye haraye namaste
GP10bhp_06u:623: BhP_06.09.046/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.09.046/1 athaivamīḍito rājan sādaraṃ tridaśairhariḥ
GP10bhp_06u:625: BhP_06.09.047/0 śrībhagavān uvāca BhP_06.09.047/1 prīto 'haṃ vaḥ suraśreṣṭhā madupasthānavidyayā
GP10bhp_06u:626: BhP_06.09.047/2 ātmaiśvaryasmṛtiḥ puṃsāṃ bhaktiścaiva yayā mayi BhP_06.09.048/1 kiṃ durāpaṃ mayi prīte tathāpi vibudharṣabhāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:627: BhP_06.09.048/2 mayy ekāntamatirnānyan matto vāñchati tattvavit BhP_06.09.049/1 na veda kṛpaṇaḥ śreya ātmano guṇavastudṛk
GP10bhp_06u:628: BhP_06.09.049/2 tasya tān icchato yacchedyadi so 'pi tathāvidhaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:629: BhP_06.09.050/1 svayaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ vidvān na vakty ajñāya karma hi BhP_06.09.050/2 na rāti rogiṇo 'pathyaṃ vāñchato 'pi bhiṣaktamaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:630: BhP_06.09.051/1 maghavan yāta bhadraṃ vo dadhyañcamṛṣisattamam BhP_06.09.051/2 vidyāvratatapaḥsāraṃ gātraṃ yācata mā ciram BhP_06.09.052/1 sa vā adhigato dadhyaṅṅ aśvibhyāṃ brahma niṣkalam
GP10bhp_06u:631: BhP_06.09.052/2 yadvā aśvaśiro nāma tayoramaratāṃ vyadhāt BhP_06.09.053/1 dadhyaṅṅ ātharvaṇastvaṣṭre varmābhedyaṃ madātmakam
GP10bhp_06u:632: BhP_06.09.053/2 viśvarūpāya yat prādāt tvaṣṭā yat tvamadhāstataḥ
GP10bhp_06u:634: BhP_06.09.054/2 tatastairāyudhaśreṣṭho viśvakarmavinirmitaḥ BhP_06.09.054/3 yena vṛtraśiro hartā mattejaupabṛṃhitaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:636: BhP_06.09.055/2 bhūyaḥ prāpsyatha bhadraṃ vo na hiṃsanti ca matparān BhP_06.10.001/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
GP10bhp_06u:641: BhP_06.10.003/1 api vṛndārakā yūyaṃ na jānītha śarīriṇām
GP10bhp_06u:644: BhP_06.10.004/2 ka utsaheta taṃ dātuṃ bhikṣamāṇāya viṣṇave
GP10bhp_06u:645: BhP_06.10.005/0 śrīdevā ūcuḥ BhP_06.10.005/1 kiṃ nu taddustyajaṃ brahman puṃsāṃ bhūtānukampinām
GP10bhp_06u:647: BhP_06.10.006/1 nūnaṃ svārthaparo loko na veda parasaṅkaṭam
GP10bhp_06u:648: BhP_06.10.006/2 yadi veda na yāceta neti nāha yadīśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_06u:650: BhP_06.10.007/1 dharmaṃ vaḥ śrotukāmena yūyaṃ me pratyudāhṛtāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:651: BhP_06.10.007/2 eṣa vaḥ priyamātmānaṃ tyajantaṃ santyajāmy aham
GP10bhp_06u:652: BhP_06.10.008/1 yo 'dhruveṇātmanā nāthā na dharmaṃ na yaśaḥ pumān
GP10bhp_06u:653: BhP_06.10.008/2 īheta bhūtadayayā sa śocyaḥ sthāvarairapi BhP_06.10.009/1 etāvān avyayo dharmaḥ puṇyaślokairupāsitaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:655: BhP_06.10.010/1 aho dainyamaho kaṣṭaṃ pārakyaiḥ kṣaṇabhaṅguraiḥ BhP_06.10.010/2 yan nopakuryādasvārthairmartyaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:658: BhP_06.10.011/2 pare bhagavati brahmaṇy ātmānaṃ sannayan jahau
GP10bhp_06u:659: BhP_06.10.012/1 yatākṣāsumanobuddhistattvadṛg dhvastabandhanaḥ BhP_06.10.012/2 āsthitaḥ paramaṃ yogaṃ na dehaṃ bubudhe gatam
GP10bhp_06u:664: BhP_06.10.015/1 vṛtramabhyadravac chatrumasurānīkayūthapaiḥ BhP_06.10.015/2 paryastamojasā rājan kruddho rudra ivāntakam BhP_06.10.016/1 tataḥ surāṇāmasurai raṇaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:666: BhP_06.10.017/1 rudrairvasubhirādityairaśvibhyāṃ pitṛvahnibhiḥ BhP_06.10.017/2 marudbhirṛbhubhiḥ sādhyairviśvedevairmarutpatim BhP_06.10.018/1 dṛṣṭvā vajradharaṃ śakraṃ rocamānaṃ svayā śriyā
GP10bhp_06u:671: BhP_06.10.020/2 daiteyā dānavā yakṣā rakṣāṃsi ca sahasraśaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:672: BhP_06.10.021/1 sumālimālipramukhāḥ kārtasvaraparicchadāḥ BhP_06.10.021/2 pratiṣidhyendrasenāgraṃ mṛtyorapi durāsadam
GP10bhp_06u:676: BhP_06.10.023/2 sarvato 'vākiran śastrairastraiśca vibudharṣabhān BhP_06.10.024/1 na te 'dṛśyanta sañchannāḥ śarajālaiḥ samantataḥ
GP10bhp_06u:677: BhP_06.10.024/2 puṅkhānupuṅkhapatitairjyotīṃṣīva nabhoghanaiḥ BhP_06.10.025/1 na te śastrāstravarṣaughā hy āseduḥ surasainikān
GP10bhp_06u:681: BhP_06.10.027/1 tān akṣatān svastimato niśāmya śastrāstrapūgairatha vṛtranāthāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:682: BhP_06.10.027/2 drumairdṛṣadbhirvividhādriśṛṅgair avikṣatāṃstatrasurindrasainikān BhP_06.10.028/1 sarve prayāsā abhavan vimoghāḥ kṛtāḥ kṛtā devagaṇeṣu daityaiḥ BhP_06.10.028/2 kṛṣṇānukūleṣu yathā mahatsu kṣudraiḥ prayuktā ūṣatī
GP10bhp_06u:684: BhP_06.10.029/1 te svaprayāsaṃ vitathaṃ nirīkṣya harāvabhaktā hatayuddhadarpāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:685: BhP_06.10.029/2 palāyanāyājimukhe visṛjya patiṃ manaste dadhurāttasārāḥ BhP_06.10.030/1 vṛtro 'surāṃstān anugān manasvī pradhāvataḥ prekṣya babhāṣa etat
GP10bhp_06u:686: BhP_06.10.030/2 palāyitaṃ prekṣya balaṃ ca bhagnaṃ bhayena tīvreṇa vihasya vīraḥ
GP10bhp_06u:687: BhP_06.10.031/1 kālopapannāṃ rucirāṃ manasvināṃ jagāda vācaṃ puruṣapravīraḥ
GP10bhp_06u:688: BhP_06.10.031/2 he vipracitte namuce puloman mayānarvan chambara me śṛṇudhvam BhP_06.10.032/1 jātasya mṛtyurdhruva eva sarvataḥ pratikriyā yasya na ceha kḷptā
GP10bhp_06u:689: BhP_06.10.032/2 loko yaśaścātha tato yadi hy amuṃ ko nāma mṛtyuṃ na vṛṇīta yuktam
GP10bhp_06u:690: BhP_06.10.033/1 dvau sammatāviha mṛtyū durāpau yadbrahmasandhāraṇayā jitāsuḥ
GP10bhp_06u:692: BhP_06.11.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.11.001/1 ta evaṃ śaṃsato dharmaṃ vacaḥ patyuracetasaḥ

GP10bhp_06u:884: BhP_06.14.026/2 yathā tarema duṣpāraṃ prajayā tadvidhehi naḥ
