GP10bhp_06u:887: BhP_06.14.028/1 jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā ca yā rājño mahiṣīṇāṃ ca bhārata BhP_06.14.028/2 nāmnā kṛtadyutistasyai yajñocchiṣṭamadāddvijaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:892: BhP_06.14.031/1 tasyā anudinaṃ garbhaḥ śuklapakṣa ivoḍupaḥ BhP_06.14.031/2 vavṛdhe śūraseneśa tejasā śanakairnṛpa
GP10bhp_06u:893: BhP_06.14.032/1 atha kāla upāvṛtte kumāraḥ samajāyata BhP_06.14.032/2 janayan śūrasenānāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ paramāṃ mudam BhP_06.14.033/1 hṛṣṭo rājā kumārasya snātaḥ śuciralaṅkṛtaḥ BhP_06.14.033/2 vācayitvāśiṣo vipraiḥ kārayāmāsa jātakam
GP10bhp_06u:894: BhP_06.14.034/1 tebhyo hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
GP10bhp_06u:895: BhP_06.14.034/2 grāmān hayān gajān prādāddhenūnāmarbudāni ṣaṭ BhP_06.14.035/1 vavarṣa kāmān anyeṣāṃ parjanya iva dehinām
GP10bhp_06u:898: BhP_06.14.036/2 yathā niḥsvasya kṛcchrāpte dhane sneho 'nvavardhata
GP10bhp_06u:902: BhP_06.14.038/2 na tathānyeṣu sañjajñe bālaṃ lālayato 'nvaham
GP10bhp_06u:905: BhP_06.14.040/1 dhig aprajāṃ striyaṃ pāpāṃ patyuścāgṛhasammatām BhP_06.14.040/2 suprajābhiḥ sapatnībhirdāsīmiva tiraskṛtām
GP10bhp_06u:906: BhP_06.14.041/1 dāsīnāṃ ko nu santāpaḥ svāminaḥ paricaryayā
GP10bhp_06u:907: BhP_06.14.041/2 abhīkṣṇaṃ labdhamānānāṃ dāsyā dāsīva durbhagāḥ BhP_06.14.042/1 evaṃ sandahyamānānāṃ sapatnyāḥ putrasampadā
GP10bhp_06u:910: BhP_06.14.043/2 garaṃ daduḥ kumārāya durmarṣā nṛpatiṃ prati
GP10bhp_06u:912: BhP_06.14.044/2 supta eveti sañcintya nirīkṣya vyacaradgṛhe BhP_06.14.045/1 śayānaṃ suciraṃ bālamupadhārya manīṣiṇī
GP10bhp_06u:913: BhP_06.14.045/2 putramānaya me bhadre iti dhātrīmacodayat BhP_06.14.046/1 sā śayānamupavrajya dṛṣṭvā cottāralocanam
GP10bhp_06u:915: BhP_06.14.047/1 tasyāstadākarṇya bhṛśāturaṃ svaraṃ ghnantyāḥ karābhyāmura uccakairapi
GP10bhp_06u:916: BhP_06.14.047/2 praviśya rājñī tvarayātmajāntikaṃ dadarśa bālaṃ sahasā
GP10bhp_06u:917: mṛtaṃ sutam BhP_06.14.048/1 papāta bhūmau parivṛddhayā śucā mumoha vibhraṣṭaśiroruhāmbarā
GP10bhp_06u:918: BhP_06.14.049/1 tato nṛpāntaḥpuravartino janā narāśca nāryaśca niśamya
GP10bhp_06u:920: BhP_06.14.049/2 āgatya tulyavyasanāḥ suduḥkhitās tāśca vyalīkaṃ ruruduḥ
GP10bhp_06u:922: BhP_06.14.050/1 śrutvā mṛtaṃ putramalakṣitāntakaṃ vinaṣṭadṛṣṭiḥ prapatan skhalan pathi BhP_06.14.050/2 snehānubandhaidhitayā śucā bhṛśaṃ vimūrcchito
GP10bhp_06u:924: BhP_06.14.051/1 papāta bālasya sa pādamūle mṛtasya visrastaśiroruhāmbaraḥ
GP10bhp_06u:925: BhP_06.14.051/2 dīrghaṃ śvasan bāṣpakaloparodhato niruddhakaṇṭho na śaśāka
GP10bhp_06u:927: BhP_06.14.052/1 patiṃ nirīkṣyoruśucārpitaṃ tadā mṛtaṃ ca bālaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:929: BhP_06.14.052/2 janasya rājñī prakṛteśca hṛdrujaṃ satī dadhānā vilalāpa citradhā BhP_06.14.053/1 stanadvayaṃ kuṅkumapaṅkamaṇḍitaṃ niṣiñcatī
GP10bhp_06u:931: BhP_06.14.053/2 vikīrya keśān vigalatsrajaḥ sutaṃ śuśoca citraṃ kurarīva susvaram BhP_06.14.054/1 aho vidhātastvamatīva bāliśo
GP10bhp_06u:933: BhP_06.14.054/2 pare nu jīvaty aparasya yā mṛtir viparyayaścet tvamasi dhruvaḥ paraḥ BhP_06.14.055/1 na hi kramaścediha mṛtyujanmanoḥ śarīriṇāmastu tadātmakarmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:934: BhP_06.14.055/2 yaḥ snehapāśo nijasargavṛddhaye svayaṃ kṛtaste tamimaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:936: BhP_06.14.056/1 tvaṃ tāta nārhasi ca māṃ kṛpaṇāmanāthāṃ
GP10bhp_06u:937: BhP_06.14.056/2 tyaktuṃ vicakṣva pitaraṃ tava śokataptam BhP_06.14.056/3 añjastarema bhavatāprajadustaraṃ
GP10bhp_06u:938: BhP_06.14.056/4 dhvāntaṃ na yāhy akaruṇena yamena dūram
GP10bhp_06u:939: BhP_06.14.057/1 uttiṣṭha tāta ta ime śiśavo vayasyās
GP10bhp_06u:941: BhP_06.14.057/3 suptaściraṃ hy aśanayā ca bhavān parīto
GP10bhp_06u:942: BhP_06.14.057/4 bhuṅkṣva stanaṃ piba śuco hara naḥ svakānām
GP10bhp_06u:943: BhP_06.14.058/1 nāhaṃ tanūja dadṛśe hatamaṅgalā te BhP_06.14.058/2 mugdhasmitaṃ muditavīkṣaṇamānanābjam BhP_06.14.058/3 kiṃ vā gato 'sy apunaranvayamanyalokaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:944: BhP_06.14.058/4 nīto 'ghṛṇena na śṛṇomi kalā giraste
GP10bhp_06u:945: BhP_06.14.059/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.14.059/1 vilapantyā mṛtaṃ putramiti citravilāpanaiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:946: BhP_06.14.059/2 citraketurbhṛśaṃ tapto muktakaṇṭho ruroda ha BhP_06.14.060/1 tayorvilapatoḥ sarve dampatyostadanuvratāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:947: BhP_06.14.060/2 ruruduḥ sma narā nāryaḥ sarvamāsīdacetanam BhP_06.14.061/1 evaṃ kaśmalamāpannaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:949: BhP_06.15.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.15.001/1 ūcaturmṛtakopānte patitaṃ mṛtakopamam
GP10bhp_06u:951: BhP_06.15.002/1 ko 'yaṃ syāt tava rājendra bhavān yamanuśocati BhP_06.15.002/2 tvaṃ cāsya katamaḥ sṛṣṭau puredānīmataḥ param
GP10bhp_06u:952: BhP_06.15.003/1 yathā prayānti saṃyānti srotovegena bālukāḥ BhP_06.15.003/2 saṃyujyante viyujyante tathā kālena dehinaḥ BhP_06.15.004/1 yathā dhānāsu vai dhānā bhavanti na bhavanti ca BhP_06.15.004/2 evaṃ bhūtāni bhūteṣu coditānīśamāyayā
GP10bhp_06u:953: BhP_06.15.005/1 vayaṃ ca tvaṃ ca ye ceme tulyakālāścarācarāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:954: BhP_06.15.005/2 janmamṛtyoryathā paścāt prāṅ naivamadhunāpi bhoḥ BhP_06.15.006/1 bhūtairbhūtāni bhūteśaḥ sṛjaty avati hanti ca
GP10bhp_06u:957: BhP_06.15.007/2 bījādeva yathā bījaṃ dehy artha iva śāśvataḥ
GP10bhp_06u:960: BhP_06.15.009/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.15.009/1 evamāśvāsito rājā citraketurdvijoktibhiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:963: BhP_06.15.010/1 kau yuvāṃ jñānasampannau mahiṣṭhau ca mahīyasām
GP10bhp_06u:965: BhP_06.15.011/1 caranti hy avanau kāmaṃ brāhmaṇā bhagavatpriyāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:969: BhP_06.15.013/1 vasiṣṭho bhagavān rāmaḥ kapilo bādarāyaṇiḥ BhP_06.15.013/2 durvāsā yājñavalkyaśca
GP10bhp_06u:973: BhP_06.15.015/2 ete pare ca siddheśāścaranti jñānahetavaḥ BhP_06.15.016/1 tasmādyuvāṃ grāmyapaśormama mūḍhadhiyaḥ prabhū
GP10bhp_06u:974: BhP_06.15.016/2 andhe tamasi magnasya jñānadīpa udīryatām BhP_06.15.017/0 śrīaṅgirā uvāca BhP_06.15.017/1 ahaṃ te putrakāmasya putrado 'smy aṅgirā nṛpa BhP_06.15.017/2 eṣa brahmasutaḥ sākṣān nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:975: BhP_06.15.018/1 itthaṃ tvāṃ putraśokena magnaṃ tamasi dustare
GP10bhp_06u:976: BhP_06.15.018/2 atadarhamanusmṛtya mahāpuruṣagocaram BhP_06.15.019/1 anugrahāya bhavataḥ prāptāvāvāmiha prabho
GP10bhp_06u:978: BhP_06.15.020/1 tadaiva te paraṃ jñānaṃ dadāmi gṛhamāgataḥ
GP10bhp_06u:979: BhP_06.15.020/2 jñātvānyābhiniveśaṃ te putrameva dadāmy aham BhP_06.15.021/1 adhunā putriṇāṃ tāpo bhavataivānubhūyate
GP10bhp_06u:980: BhP_06.15.021/2 evaṃ dārā gṛhā rāyo vividhaiśvaryasampadaḥ BhP_06.15.022/1 śabdādayaśca viṣayāścalā rājyavibhūtayaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:981: BhP_06.15.022/2 mahī rājyaṃ balaṃ koṣo bhṛtyāmātyasuhṛjjanāḥ BhP_06.15.023/1 sarve 'pi śūraseneme śokamohabhayārtidāḥ BhP_06.15.023/2 gandharvanagaraprakhyāḥ svapnamāyāmanorathāḥ BhP_06.15.024/1 dṛśyamānā vinārthena na dṛśyante manobhavāḥ BhP_06.15.024/2 karmabhirdhyāyato nānā karmāṇi manaso 'bhavan
GP10bhp_06u:982: BhP_06.15.025/1 ayaṃ hi dehino deho dravyajñānakriyātmakaḥ BhP_06.15.025/2 dehino vividhakleśa
GP10bhp_06u:983: BhP_06.15.026/1 tasmāt svasthena manasā vimṛśya gatimātmanaḥ BhP_06.15.026/2 dvaite dhruvārthaviśrambhaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:984: BhP_06.15.027/0 śrīnārada uvāca BhP_06.15.027/1 etāṃ mantropaniṣadaṃ pratīccha prayato mama BhP_06.15.027/2 yāṃ dhārayan saptarātrāddraṣṭā saṅkarṣaṇaṃ vibhum BhP_06.15.028/1 yatpādamūlamupasṛtya narendra pūrve
GP10bhp_06u:986: BhP_06.15.028/3 sadyastadīyamatulānadhikaṃ mahitvaṃ BhP_06.15.028/4 prāpurbhavān api paraṃ na cirādupaiti BhP_06.16.001/0 śrībādarāyaṇiruvāca
GP10bhp_06u:987: BhP_06.16.001/1 atha devaṛṣī rājan samparetaṃ nṛpātmajam BhP_06.16.001/2 darśayitveti hovāca
GP10bhp_06u:988: BhP_06.16.002/0 śrīnārada uvāca BhP_06.16.002/1 jīvātman paśya bhadraṃ te mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca te BhP_06.16.002/2 suhṛdo bāndhavāstaptāḥ śucā tvatkṛtayā bhṛśam BhP_06.16.003/1 kalevaraṃ svamāviśya śeṣamāyuḥ suhṛdvṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:989: BhP_06.16.003/2 bhuṅkṣva bhogān pitṛprattān adhitiṣṭha nṛpāsanam BhP_06.16.004/0 jīva uvāca BhP_06.16.004/1 kasmin janmany amī mahyaṃ pitaro mātaro 'bhavan
GP10bhp_06u:990: BhP_06.16.004/2 karmabhirbhrāmyamāṇasya devatiryaṅnṛyoniṣu BhP_06.16.005/1 bandhujñātyarimadhyastha mitrodāsīnavidviṣaḥ BhP_06.16.005/2 sarva eva hi sarveṣāṃ bhavanti kramaśo mithaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:991: BhP_06.16.006/1 yathā vastūni paṇyāni hemādīni tatastataḥ BhP_06.16.006/2 paryaṭanti nareṣvevaṃ jīvo yoniṣu kartṛṣu BhP_06.16.007/1 nityasyārthasya sambandho hy anityo dṛśyate nṛṣu
GP10bhp_06u:992: BhP_06.16.007/2 yāvadyasya hi sambandho mamatvaṃ tāvadeva hi
GP10bhp_06u:993: BhP_06.16.008/1 evaṃ yonigato jīvaḥ sa nityo nirahaṅkṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:994: BhP_06.16.008/2 yāvadyatropalabhyeta tāvat svatvaṃ hi tasya tat
GP10bhp_06u:995: BhP_06.16.009/1 eṣa nityo 'vyayaḥ sūkṣma eṣa sarvāśrayaḥ svadṛk
GP10bhp_06u:997: BhP_06.16.010/1 na hy asyāsti priyaḥ kaścin nāpriyaḥ svaḥ paro 'pi vā
GP10bhp_06u:998: BhP_06.16.010/2 ekaḥ sarvadhiyāṃ draṣṭā kartṝṇāṃ guṇadoṣayoḥ BhP_06.16.011/1 nādatta ātmā hi guṇaṃ na doṣaṃ na kriyāphalam BhP_06.16.011/2 udāsīnavadāsīnaḥ parāvaradṛg īśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1000: BhP_06.16.012/1 ity udīrya gato jīvo jñātayastasya te tadā
GP10bhp_06u:1002: BhP_06.16.013/1 nirhṛtya jñātayo jñāterdehaṃ kṛtvocitāḥ kriyāḥ BhP_06.16.013/2 tatyajurdustyajaṃ snehaṃ śokamohabhayārtidam
GP10bhp_06u:1010: BhP_06.16.017/1 atha tasmai prapannāya bhaktāya prayatātmane BhP_06.16.017/2 bhagavān nāradaḥ prīto vidyāmetāmuvāca ha BhP_06.16.018/1 oṃ namastubhyaṃ bhagavate vāsudevāya dhīmahi BhP_06.16.018/2 pradyumnāyāniruddhāya namaḥ saṅkarṣaṇāya ca
GP10bhp_06u:1015: BhP_06.16.021/1 vacasy uparate 'prāpya ya eko manasā saha
GP10bhp_06u:1016: BhP_06.16.021/2 anāmarūpaścinmātraḥ so 'vyān naḥ sadasatparaḥ BhP_06.16.022/1 yasminnidaṃ yataścedaṃ tiṣṭhaty apyeti jāyate BhP_06.16.022/2 mṛṇmayeṣviva mṛjjātistasmai te brahmaṇe namaḥ BhP_06.16.023/1 yan na spṛśanti na vidurmanobuddhīndriyāsavaḥ BhP_06.16.023/2 antarbahiśca vitataṃ vyomavat tan nato 'smy aham
GP10bhp_06u:1020: BhP_06.16.025/1 oṃ namo bhagavate mahāpuruṣāya mahānubhāvāya mahāvibhūtipataye sakalasātvataparivṛḍhanikarakarakamalakuḍmalopalālitacaraṇāravindayugala paramaparameṣṭhin namaste BhP_06.16.026/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.16.026/1 bhaktāyaitāṃ prapannāya vidyāmādiśya nāradaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1021: BhP_06.16.026/2 yayāvaṅgirasā sākaṃ dhāma svāyambhuvaṃ prabho BhP_06.16.027/1 citraketustu tāṃ vidyāṃ yathā nāradabhāṣitām BhP_06.16.027/2 dhārayāmāsa saptāhamabbhakṣaḥ susamāhitaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1022: BhP_06.16.028/1 tataḥ sa saptarātrānte vidyayā dhāryamāṇayā BhP_06.16.028/2 vidyādharādhipatyaṃ ca lebhe 'pratihataṃ nṛpa
GP10bhp_06u:1023: BhP_06.16.029/1 tataḥ katipayāhobhirvidyayeddhamanogatiḥ BhP_06.16.029/2 jagāma devadevasya śeṣasya caraṇāntikam
GP10bhp_06u:1027: siddheśvaramaṇḍalaiḥ prabhum BhP_06.16.031/1 taddarśanadhvastasamastakilbiṣaḥ svasthāmalāntaḥkaraṇo 'bhyayān muniḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1031: BhP_06.16.032/2 premoparuddhākhilavarṇanirgamo naivāśakat taṃ prasamīḍituṃ ciram BhP_06.16.033/1 tataḥ samādhāya mano manīṣayā babhāṣa etat pratilabdhavāg asau BhP_06.16.033/2 niyamya sarvendriyabāhyavartanaṃ jagadguruṃ
GP10bhp_06u:1034: BhP_06.16.034/1 ajita jitaḥ samamatibhiḥ sādhubhirbhavān jitātmabhirbhavatā BhP_06.16.034/2 vijitāste 'pi ca bhajatām akāmātmanāṃ ya ātmado 'tikaruṇaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1035: BhP_06.16.035/1 tava vibhavaḥ khalu bhagavan jagadudayasthitilayādīni BhP_06.16.035/2 viśvasṛjaste 'ṃśāṃśās tatra mṛṣā spardhanti pṛthag abhimatyā BhP_06.16.036/1 paramāṇuparamamahatos tvamādyantāntaravartī trayavidhuraḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1036: BhP_06.16.036/2 ādāvante 'pi ca sattvānāṃ yaddhruvaṃ tadevāntarāle 'pi
GP10bhp_06u:1039: BhP_06.16.038/1 viṣayatṛṣo narapaśavo ya upāsate vibhūtīrna paraṃ tvām
GP10bhp_06u:1040: BhP_06.16.038/2 teṣāmāśiṣa īśa tadanu vinaśyanti yathā rājakulam
GP10bhp_06u:1041: BhP_06.16.039/1 kāmadhiyastvayi racitā na parama rohanti yathā
GP10bhp_06u:1044: BhP_06.16.040/1 jitamajita tadā bhavatā yadāha bhāgavataṃ dharmamanavadyam
GP10bhp_06u:1045: BhP_06.16.040/2 niṣkiñcanā ye munaya ātmārāmā yamupāsate 'pavargāya
GP10bhp_06u:1046: BhP_06.16.041/1 viṣamamatirna yatra nṛṇāṃ tvamahamiti mama taveti ca yadanyatra BhP_06.16.041/2 viṣamadhiyā racito yaḥ sa hy aviśuddhaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1048: BhP_06.16.042/1 kaḥ kṣemo nijaparayoḥ kiyān vārthaḥ svaparadruhā dharmeṇa
GP10bhp_06u:1049: BhP_06.16.042/2 svadrohāt tava kopaḥ parasampīḍayā ca tathādharmaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1050: BhP_06.16.043/1 na vyabhicarati tavekṣā yayā hy abhihito bhāgavato dharmaḥ BhP_06.16.043/2 sthiracarasattvakadambeṣv apṛthagdhiyo yamupāsate tvāryāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1051: BhP_06.16.044/1 na hi bhagavannaghaṭitamidaṃ tvaddarśanān nṛṇāmakhilapāpakṣayaḥ BhP_06.16.044/2 yannāma sakṛc chravaṇāt pukkaśo 'pi vimucyate saṃsārāt BhP_06.16.045/1 atha bhagavan vayamadhunā tvadavalokaparimṛṣṭāśayamalāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1052: BhP_06.16.045/2 suraṛṣiṇā yat kathitaṃ tāvakena kathamanyathā bhavati
GP10bhp_06u:1053: BhP_06.16.046/1 viditamananta samastaṃ tava jagadātmano janairihācaritam BhP_06.16.046/2 vijñāpyaṃ paramaguroḥ kiyadiva savituriva khadyotaiḥ BhP_06.16.047/1 namastubhyaṃ bhagavate sakalajagatsthitilayodayeśāya
GP10bhp_06u:1055: BhP_06.16.048/1 yaṃ vai śvasantamanu viśvasṛjaḥ śvasanti BhP_06.16.048/2 yaṃ cekitānamanu cittaya uccakanti
GP10bhp_06u:1058: BhP_06.16.049/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.16.049/1 saṃstuto bhagavān evamanantastamabhāṣata
GP10bhp_06u:1060: BhP_06.16.050/0 śrībhagavān uvāca BhP_06.16.050/1 yan nāradāṅgirobhyāṃ te vyāhṛtaṃ me 'nuśāsanam
GP10bhp_06u:1061: BhP_06.16.050/2 saṃsiddho 'si tayā rājan vidyayā darśanāc ca me
GP10bhp_06u:1062: BhP_06.16.051/1 ahaṃ vai sarvabhūtāni bhūtātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ BhP_06.16.051/2 śabdabrahma paraṃ brahma mamobhe śāśvatī tanū
GP10bhp_06u:1063: BhP_06.16.052/1 loke vitatamātmānaṃ lokaṃ cātmani santatam BhP_06.16.052/2 ubhayaṃ ca mayā vyāptaṃ mayi caivobhayaṃ kṛtam
GP10bhp_06u:1064: BhP_06.16.053/1 yathā suṣuptaḥ puruṣo viśvaṃ paśyati cātmani
GP10bhp_06u:1067: BhP_06.16.054/2 māyāmātrāṇi vijñāya taddraṣṭāraṃ paraṃ smaret BhP_06.16.055/1 yena prasuptaḥ puruṣaḥ svāpaṃ vedātmanastadā BhP_06.16.055/2 sukhaṃ ca nirguṇaṃ brahma tamātmānamavehi mām
GP10bhp_06u:1069: BhP_06.16.056/2 anveti vyatiricyeta taj jñānaṃ brahma tat param
GP10bhp_06u:1071: BhP_06.16.057/2 tataḥ saṃsāra etasya dehāddeho mṛtermṛtiḥ BhP_06.16.058/1 labdhveha mānuṣīṃ yoniṃ jñānavijñānasambhavām
GP10bhp_06u:1072: BhP_06.16.058/2 ātmānaṃ yo na buddhyeta na kvacit kṣemamāpnuyāt
GP10bhp_06u:1074: BhP_06.16.059/2 abhayaṃ cāpy anīhāyāṃ saṅkalpādviramet kaviḥ BhP_06.16.060/1 sukhāya duḥkhamokṣāya kurvāte dampatī kriyāḥ BhP_06.16.060/2 tato 'nivṛttiraprāptirduḥkhasya ca sukhasya ca
GP10bhp_06u:1075: BhP_06.16.061/1 evaṃ viparyayaṃ buddhvā nṛṇāṃ vijñābhimāninām BhP_06.16.061/2 ātmanaśca gatiṃ sūkṣmāṃ sthānatrayavilakṣaṇām
GP10bhp_06u:1079: BhP_06.16.063/2 svārthaḥ sarvātmanā jñeyo yat parātmaikadarśanam BhP_06.16.064/1 tvametac chraddhayā rājannapramatto vaco mama BhP_06.16.064/2 jñānavijñānasampanno dhārayannāśu sidhyasi
GP10bhp_06u:1080: BhP_06.16.065/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.16.065/1 āśvāsya bhagavān itthaṃ citraketuṃ jagadguruḥ BhP_06.16.065/2 paśyatastasya viśvātmā tataścāntardadhe hariḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1081: BhP_06.17.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.17.001/1 yataścāntarhito 'nantastasyai kṛtvā diśe
GP10bhp_06u:1085: BhP_06.17.003/1 kulācalendradroṇīṣu nānāsaṅkalpasiddhiṣu BhP_06.17.003/2 reme vidyādharastrībhirgāpayan
GP10bhp_06u:1086: BhP_06.17.004/1 ekadā sa vimānena viṣṇudattena bhāsvatā BhP_06.17.004/2 giriśaṃ dadṛśe gacchan parītaṃ siddhacāraṇaiḥ BhP_06.17.005/1 āliṅgyāṅkīkṛtāṃ devīṃ bāhunā munisaṃsadi
GP10bhp_06u:1089: BhP_06.17.006/1 eṣa lokaguruḥ sākṣāddharmaṃ vaktā śarīriṇām BhP_06.17.006/2 āste mukhyaḥ sabhāyāṃ vai mithunībhūya bhāryayā
GP10bhp_06u:1090: BhP_06.17.007/1 jaṭādharastīvratapā brahmavādisabhāpatiḥ BhP_06.17.007/2 aṅkīkṛtya striyaṃ cāste gatahrīḥ prākṛto yathā
GP10bhp_06u:1091: BhP_06.17.008/1 prāyaśaḥ prākṛtāścāpi striyaṃ rahasi bibhrati BhP_06.17.008/2 ayaṃ mahāvratadharo bibharti sadasi striyam BhP_06.17.009/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.17.009/1 bhagavān api tac chrutvā prahasyāgādhadhīrnṛpa BhP_06.17.009/2 tūṣṇīṃ babhūva sadasi sabhyāśca tadanuvratāḥ BhP_06.17.010/1 ity atadvīryaviduṣi bruvāṇe bahvaśobhanam
GP10bhp_06u:1093: BhP_06.17.011/0 śrīpārvaty uvāca BhP_06.17.011/1 ayaṃ kimadhunā loke śāstā daṇḍadharaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1094: BhP_06.17.011/2 asmadvidhānāṃ duṣṭānāṃ nirlajjānāṃ ca viprakṛt BhP_06.17.012/1 na veda dharmaṃ kila padmayonir na brahmaputrā bhṛgunāradādyāḥ BhP_06.17.012/2 na vai kumāraḥ kapilo manuśca ye no niṣedhanty ativartinaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:1098: BhP_06.17.013/2 yaḥ kṣatrabandhuḥ paribhūya sūrīn praśāsti dhṛṣṭastadayaṃ
GP10bhp_06u:1099: hi daṇḍyaḥ BhP_06.17.014/1 nāyamarhati vaikuṇṭha pādamūlopasarpaṇam
GP10bhp_06u:1101: BhP_06.17.015/1 ataḥ pāpīyasīṃ yonimāsurīṃ yāhi durmate BhP_06.17.015/2 yatheha bhūyo mahatāṃ na kartā putra kilbiṣam
GP10bhp_06u:1102: BhP_06.17.016/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.17.016/1 evaṃ śaptaścitraketurvimānādavaruhya saḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1103: BhP_06.17.016/2 prasādayāmāsa satīṃ mūrdhnā namreṇa bhārata BhP_06.17.017/0 citraketuruvāca
GP10bhp_06u:1105: BhP_06.17.017/2 devairmartyāya yat proktaṃ pūrvadiṣṭaṃ hi tasya tat
GP10bhp_06u:1107: BhP_06.17.018/2 bhrāmyan sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca bhuṅkte sarvatra sarvadā BhP_06.17.019/1 naivātmā na paraścāpi kartā syāt sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1108: BhP_06.17.019/2 kartāraṃ manyate 'trājña ātmānaṃ parameva ca
GP10bhp_06u:1109: BhP_06.17.020/1 guṇapravāha etasmin kaḥ śāpaḥ ko nvanugrahaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1110: BhP_06.17.020/2 kaḥ svargo narakaḥ ko vā kiṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhameva vā
GP10bhp_06u:1111: BhP_06.17.021/1 ekaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni bhagavān ātmamāyayā BhP_06.17.021/2 eṣāṃ bandhaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca niṣkalaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1112: BhP_06.17.022/1 na tasya kaściddayitaḥ pratīpo na jñātibandhurna paro na ca svaḥ BhP_06.17.022/2 samasya sarvatra nirañjanasya sukhe na rāgaḥ kuta eva roṣaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1113: BhP_06.17.023/1 tathāpi tacchaktivisarga eṣāṃ sukhāya duḥkhāya hitāhitāya
GP10bhp_06u:1114: BhP_06.17.023/2 bandhāya mokṣāya ca mṛtyujanmanoḥ śarīriṇāṃ saṃsṛtaye
GP10bhp_06u:1116: BhP_06.17.024/1 atha prasādaye na tvāṃ śāpamokṣāya bhāmini
GP10bhp_06u:1117: BhP_06.17.024/2 yan manyase hy asādhūktaṃ mama tat kṣamyatāṃ sati BhP_06.17.025/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.17.025/1 iti prasādya giriśau citraketurarindama
GP10bhp_06u:1121: BhP_06.17.027/0 śrīrudra uvāca BhP_06.17.027/1 dṛṣṭavaty asi suśroṇi hareradbhutakarmaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1123: BhP_06.17.028/1 nārāyaṇaparāḥ sarve na kutaścana bibhyati BhP_06.17.028/2 svargāpavarganarakeṣvapi tulyārthadarśinaḥ BhP_06.17.029/1 dehināṃ dehasaṃyogāddvandvānīśvaralīlayā BhP_06.17.029/2 sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ mṛtirjanma śāpo 'nugraha eva ca BhP_06.17.030/1 avivekakṛtaḥ puṃso hy arthabheda ivātmani BhP_06.17.030/2 guṇadoṣavikalpaśca bhideva srajivat kṛtaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1126: BhP_06.17.032/1 nāhaṃ viriñco na kumāranāradau na brahmaputrā munayaḥ sureśāḥ BhP_06.17.032/2 vidāma yasyehitamaṃśakāṃśakā na tatsvarūpaṃ pṛthagīśamāninaḥ BhP_06.17.033/1 na hy asyāsti priyaḥ kaścin nāpriyaḥ svaḥ paro 'pi vā
GP10bhp_06u:1129: BhP_06.17.034/2 sarvatra samadṛk śānto hy ahaṃ caivācyutapriyaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1130: BhP_06.17.035/1 tasmān na vismayaḥ kāryaḥ puruṣeṣu mahātmasu
GP10bhp_06u:1132: BhP_06.17.036/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.17.036/1 iti śrutvā bhagavataḥ śivasyomābhibhāṣitam
GP10bhp_06u:1133: BhP_06.17.036/2 babhūva śāntadhī rājan devī vigatavismayā BhP_06.17.037/1 iti bhāgavato devyāḥ pratiśaptumalantamaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1134: BhP_06.17.037/2 mūrdhnā sa jagṛhe śāpametāvat sādhulakṣaṇam BhP_06.17.038/1 jajñe tvaṣṭurdakṣiṇāgnau dānavīṃ yonimāśritaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1136: BhP_06.17.039/1 etat te sarvamākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GP10bhp_06u:1140: BhP_06.17.041/1 ya etat prātarutthāya śraddhayā vāgyataḥ paṭhet
GP10bhp_06u:1141: BhP_06.17.041/2 itihāsaṃ hariṃ smṛtvā sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
GP10bhp_06u:1142: BhP_06.18.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.18.001/1 pṛśnistu patnī savituḥ sāvitrīṃ vyāhṛtiṃ
GP10bhp_06u:1143: BhP_06.18.001/2 agnihotraṃ paśuṃ somaṃ cāturmāsyaṃ mahāmakhān BhP_06.18.002/1 siddhirbhagasya bhāryāṅga mahimānaṃ vibhuṃ prabhum BhP_06.18.002/2 āśiṣaṃ ca varārohāṃ kanyāṃ prāsūta suvratām
GP10bhp_06u:1144: BhP_06.18.003/1 dhātuḥ kuhūḥ sinīvālī rākā cānumatistathā BhP_06.18.003/2 sāyaṃ darśamatha prātaḥ pūrṇamāsamanukramāt
GP10bhp_06u:1145: BhP_06.18.004/1 agnīn purīṣyān ādhatta kriyāyāṃ samanantaraḥ BhP_06.18.004/2 carṣaṇī varuṇasyāsīdyasyāṃ jāto bhṛguḥ punaḥ BhP_06.18.005/1 vālmīkiśca mahāyogī valmīkādabhavat kila
GP10bhp_06u:1147: BhP_06.18.006/1 retaḥ siṣicatuḥ kumbhe urvaśyāḥ sannidhau drutam
GP10bhp_06u:1148: BhP_06.18.006/2 revatyāṃ mitra utsargamariṣṭaṃ pippalaṃ vyadhāt BhP_06.18.007/1 paulomyāmindra ādhatta trīn putrān iti naḥ śrutam
GP10bhp_06u:1149: BhP_06.18.007/2 jayantamṛṣabhaṃ tāta tṛtīyaṃ mīḍhuṣaṃ prabhuḥ BhP_06.18.008/1 urukramasya devasya māyāvāmanarūpiṇaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1152: BhP_06.18.009/2 paścādvakṣyāmahe 'dityāṃ yathaivāvatatāra ha BhP_06.18.010/1 atha kaśyapadāyādān daiteyān kīrtayāmi te BhP_06.18.010/2 yatra bhāgavataḥ śrīmān prahrādo balireva ca
GP10bhp_06u:1156: BhP_06.18.012/2 jambhasya tanayā sā tu suṣuve caturaḥ sutān
GP10bhp_06u:1157: BhP_06.18.013/1 saṃhrādaṃ prāg anuhrādaṃ hrādaṃ prahrādameva ca
GP10bhp_06u:1158: BhP_06.18.013/2 tatsvasā siṃhikā nāma rāhuṃ vipracito 'grahīt
GP10bhp_06u:1160: BhP_06.18.014/2 saṃhrādasya kṛtirbhāryā sūta pañcajanaṃ tataḥ BhP_06.18.015/1 hrādasya dhamanirbhāryā sūta vātāpimilvalam
GP10bhp_06u:1166: BhP_06.18.018/1 bāṇa ārādhya giriśaṃ lebhe tadgaṇamukhyatām BhP_06.18.018/2 yatpārśve bhagavān āste hy adyāpi purapālakaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1168: BhP_06.18.019/2 ta āsannaprajāḥ sarve nītā indreṇa sātmatām
GP10bhp_06u:1170: BhP_06.18.020/1 kathaṃ ta āsuraṃ bhāvamapohyautpattikaṃ guro BhP_06.18.020/2 indreṇa prāpitāḥ sātmyaṃ kiṃ tat sādhu kṛtaṃ hi taiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1171: BhP_06.18.021/1 ime śraddadhate brahmannṛṣayo hi mayā saha
GP10bhp_06u:1173: BhP_06.18.022/0 śrīsūta uvāca BhP_06.18.022/1 tadviṣṇurātasya sa bādarāyaṇir vaco niśamyādṛtamalpamarthavat BhP_06.18.022/2 sabhājayan san nibhṛtena cetasā jagāda satrāyaṇa
GP10bhp_06u:1175: BhP_06.18.023/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.18.023/1 hataputrā ditiḥ śakra pārṣṇigrāheṇa viṣṇunā BhP_06.18.023/2 manyunā śokadīptena jvalantī paryacintayat
GP10bhp_06u:1177: BhP_06.18.024/2 aklinnahṛdayaṃ pāpaṃ ghātayitvā śaye sukham BhP_06.18.025/1 kṛmiviḍbhasmasaṃjñāsīdyasyeśābhihitasya ca BhP_06.18.025/2 bhūtadhruk tatkṛte svārthaṃ kiṃ veda nirayo yataḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1179: BhP_06.18.026/2 madaśoṣaka indrasya bhūyādyena suto hi me
GP10bhp_06u:1180: BhP_06.18.027/1 iti bhāvena sā bharturācacārāsakṛt priyam BhP_06.18.027/2 śuśrūṣayānurāgeṇa praśrayeṇa damena ca
GP10bhp_06u:1183: BhP_06.18.029/1 evaṃ striyā jaḍībhūto vidvān api manojñayā
GP10bhp_06u:1184: BhP_06.18.029/2 bāḍhamity āha vivaśo na tac citraṃ hi yoṣiti BhP_06.18.030/1 vilokyaikāntabhūtāni bhūtāny ādau prajāpatiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1185: BhP_06.18.030/2 striyaṃ cakre svadehārdhaṃ yayā puṃsāṃ matirhṛtā
GP10bhp_06u:1186: BhP_06.18.031/1 evaṃ śuśrūṣitastāta bhagavān kaśyapaḥ striyā BhP_06.18.031/2 prahasya paramaprīto ditimāhābhinandya ca
GP10bhp_06u:1187: BhP_06.18.032/0 śrīkaśyapa uvāca BhP_06.18.032/1 varaṃ varaya vāmoru prītaste 'hamanindite
GP10bhp_06u:1188: BhP_06.18.032/2 striyā bhartari suprīte kaḥ kāma iha cāgamaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1189: BhP_06.18.033/1 patireva hi nārīṇāṃ daivataṃ paramaṃ smṛtam
GP10bhp_06u:1190: BhP_06.18.033/2 mānasaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vāsudevaḥ śriyaḥ patiḥ BhP_06.18.034/1 sa eva devatāliṅgairnāmarūpavikalpitaiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1191: BhP_06.18.034/2 ijyate bhagavān pumbhiḥ strībhiśca patirūpadhṛk BhP_06.18.035/1 tasmāt pativratā nāryaḥ śreyaskāmāḥ sumadhyame BhP_06.18.035/2 yajante 'nanyabhāvena patimātmānamīśvaram
GP10bhp_06u:1192: BhP_06.18.036/1 so 'haṃ tvayārcito bhadre īdṛgbhāvena bhaktitaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1193: BhP_06.18.036/2 taṃ te sampādaye kāmamasatīnāṃ sudurlabham BhP_06.18.037/0 ditiruvāca
GP10bhp_06u:1194: BhP_06.18.037/1 varado yadi me brahman putramindrahaṇaṃ vṛṇe
GP10bhp_06u:1195: BhP_06.18.037/2 amṛtyuṃ mṛtaputrāhaṃ yena me ghātitau sutau
GP10bhp_06u:1196: BhP_06.18.038/1 niśamya tadvaco vipro vimanāḥ paryatapyata BhP_06.18.038/2 aho adharmaḥ sumahān adya me samupasthitaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1198: BhP_06.18.039/2 gṛhītacetāḥ kṛpaṇaḥ patiṣye narake dhruvam BhP_06.18.040/1 ko 'tikramo 'nuvartantyāḥ svabhāvamiha yoṣitaḥ BhP_06.18.040/2 dhiṅ māṃ batābudhaṃ svārthe yadahaṃ tvajitendriyaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1200: BhP_06.18.041/2 hṛdayaṃ kṣuradhārābhaṃ strīṇāṃ ko veda ceṣṭitam
GP10bhp_06u:1201: BhP_06.18.042/1 na hi kaścit priyaḥ strīṇāmañjasā svāśiṣātmanām
GP10bhp_06u:1202: BhP_06.18.042/2 patiṃ putraṃ bhrātaraṃ vā ghnanty arthe ghātayanti ca BhP_06.18.043/1 pratiśrutaṃ dadāmīti vacastan na mṛṣā bhavet
GP10bhp_06u:1204: BhP_06.18.044/1 iti sañcintya bhagavān mārīcaḥ kurunandana BhP_06.18.044/2 uvāca kiñcit kupita ātmānaṃ ca vigarhayan
GP10bhp_06u:1205: BhP_06.18.045/0 śrīkaśyapa uvāca BhP_06.18.045/1 putraste bhavitā bhadre indrahādevabāndhavaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1206: BhP_06.18.045/2 saṃvatsaraṃ vratamidaṃ yady añjo dhārayiṣyasi BhP_06.18.046/0 ditiruvāca
GP10bhp_06u:1207: BhP_06.18.046/1 dhārayiṣye vrataṃ brahman brūhi kāryāṇi yāni me
GP10bhp_06u:1208: BhP_06.18.046/2 yāni ceha niṣiddhāni na vrataṃ ghnanti yāny uta BhP_06.18.047/0 śrīkaśyapa uvāca BhP_06.18.047/1 na hiṃsyādbhūtajātāni na śapen nānṛtaṃ vadet
GP10bhp_06u:1209: BhP_06.18.047/2 na chindyān nakharomāṇi na spṛśedyadamaṅgalam BhP_06.18.048/1 nāpsu snāyān na kupyeta na sambhāṣeta durjanaiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1210: BhP_06.18.048/2 na vasītādhautavāsaḥ srajaṃ ca vidhṛtāṃ kvacit
GP10bhp_06u:1211: BhP_06.18.049/1 nocchiṣṭaṃ caṇḍikānnaṃ ca sāmiṣaṃ vṛṣalāhṛtam BhP_06.18.049/2 bhuñjītodakyayā dṛṣṭaṃ piben nāñjalinā tvapaḥ BhP_06.18.050/1 nocchiṣṭāspṛṣṭasalilā sandhyāyāṃ muktamūrdhajā
GP10bhp_06u:1214: BhP_06.18.051/2 śayīta nāparāṅ nānyairna nagnā na ca sandhyayoḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1216: BhP_06.18.052/2 pūjayet prātarāśāt prāg goviprāñ śriyamacyutam BhP_06.18.053/1 striyo vīravatīścārcet
GP10bhp_06u:1217: BhP_06.18.053/2 patiṃ cārcyopatiṣṭheta dhyāyet koṣṭhagataṃ ca tam
GP10bhp_06u:1219: BhP_06.18.054/2 dhārayiṣyasi cet tubhyaṃ śakrahā bhavitā sutaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1220: BhP_06.18.055/1 bāḍhamity abhyupetyātha ditī rājan mahāmanāḥ BhP_06.18.055/2 kaśyapādgarbhamādhatta vrataṃ cāñjo dadhāra sā BhP_06.18.056/1 mātṛṣvasurabhiprāyamindra ājñāya mānada
GP10bhp_06u:1224: BhP_06.18.058/1 evaṃ tasyā vratasthāyā vratacchidraṃ harirnṛpa BhP_06.18.058/2 prepsuḥ paryacaraj jihmo mṛgaheva mṛgākṛtiḥ BhP_06.18.059/1 nādhyagacchadvratacchidraṃ tatparo 'tha mahīpate
GP10bhp_06u:1225: BhP_06.18.059/2 cintāṃ tīvrāṃ gataḥ śakraḥ kena me syāc chivaṃ tviha
GP10bhp_06u:1226: BhP_06.18.060/1 ekadā sā tu sandhyāyāmucchiṣṭā vratakarśitā BhP_06.18.060/2 aspṛṣṭavāryadhautāṅghriḥ suṣvāpa vidhimohitā
GP10bhp_06u:1228: BhP_06.18.061/2 diteḥ praviṣṭa udaraṃ yogeśo yogamāyayā BhP_06.18.062/1 cakarta saptadhā garbhaṃ vajreṇa kanakaprabham BhP_06.18.062/2 rudantaṃ saptadhaikaikaṃ mā rodīriti tān punaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1229: BhP_06.18.063/1 tamūcuḥ pāṭyamānāste sarve prāñjalayo nṛpa BhP_06.18.063/2 kiṃ na indra jighāṃsasi bhrātaro marutastava
GP10bhp_06u:1230: BhP_06.18.064/1 mā bhaiṣṭa bhrātaro mahyaṃ yūyamity āha kauśikaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1231: BhP_06.18.064/2 ananyabhāvān pārṣadān ātmano marutāṃ gaṇān BhP_06.18.065/1 na mamāra ditergarbhaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1232: BhP_06.18.065/2 bahudhā kuliśakṣuṇṇo drauṇyastreṇa yathā bhavān BhP_06.18.066/1 sakṛdiṣṭvādipuruṣaṃ puruṣo yāti sāmyatām
GP10bhp_06u:1235: BhP_06.18.067/2 vyapohya mātṛdoṣaṃ te hariṇā somapāḥ kṛtāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1240: BhP_06.18.070/1 ekaḥ saṅkalpitaḥ putraḥ sapta saptābhavan katham
GP10bhp_06u:1241: BhP_06.18.070/2 yadi te viditaṃ putra satyaṃ kathaya mā mṛṣā BhP_06.18.071/0 indra uvāca BhP_06.18.071/1 amba te 'haṃ vyavasitamupadhāryāgato 'ntikam
GP10bhp_06u:1242: BhP_06.18.071/2 labdhāntaro 'cchidaṃ garbhamarthabuddhirna dharmadṛk BhP_06.18.072/1 kṛtto me saptadhā garbha āsan sapta kumārakāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1243: BhP_06.18.072/2 te 'pi caikaikaśo vṛkṇāḥ saptadhā nāpi mamrire BhP_06.18.073/1 tatastat paramāścaryaṃ vīkṣya vyavasitaṃ mayā BhP_06.18.073/2 mahāpuruṣapūjāyāḥ siddhiḥ kāpy ānuṣaṅgiṇī
GP10bhp_06u:1245: BhP_06.18.074/2 ye tu necchanty api paraṃ te svārthakuśalāḥ smṛtāḥ BhP_06.18.075/1 ārādhyātmapradaṃ devaṃ svātmānaṃ jagadīśvaram
GP10bhp_06u:1246: BhP_06.18.075/2 ko vṛṇīta guṇasparśaṃ budhaḥ syān narake 'pi yat
GP10bhp_06u:1247: BhP_06.18.076/1 tadidaṃ mama daurjanyaṃ bāliśasya mahīyasi BhP_06.18.076/2 kṣantumarhasi mātastvaṃ diṣṭyā garbho mṛtotthitaḥ BhP_06.18.077/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.18.077/1 indrastayābhyanujñātaḥ śuddhabhāvena tuṣṭayā
GP10bhp_06u:1248: BhP_06.18.077/2 marudbhiḥ saha tāṃ natvā jagāma tridivaṃ prabhuḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1249: BhP_06.18.078/1 evaṃ te sarvamākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GP10bhp_06u:1250: BhP_06.18.078/2 maṅgalaṃ marutāṃ janma kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te
GP10bhp_06u:1252: BhP_06.19.001/1 vrataṃ puṃsavanaṃ brahman bhavatā yadudīritam BhP_06.19.001/2 tasya veditumicchāmi yena viṣṇuḥ prasīdati BhP_06.19.002/0 śrīśuka uvāca BhP_06.19.002/1 śukle mārgaśire pakṣe yoṣidbharturanujñayā
GP10bhp_06u:1254: BhP_06.19.003/1 niśamya marutāṃ janma brāhmaṇān anumantrya ca
GP10bhp_06u:1256: BhP_06.19.003/3 pūjayet prātarāśāt prāg bhagavantaṃ śriyā saha
GP10bhp_06u:1257: BhP_06.19.004/1 alaṃ te nirapekṣāya pūrṇakāma namo 'stu te
GP10bhp_06u:1259: BhP_06.19.005/1 yathā tvaṃ kṛpayā bhūtyā tejasā mahimaujasā
GP10bhp_06u:1260: BhP_06.19.005/2 juṣṭa īśa guṇaiḥ sarvaistato 'si bhagavān prabhuḥ BhP_06.19.006/1 viṣṇupatni mahāmāye mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇe
GP10bhp_06u:1261: BhP_06.19.006/2 prīyethā me mahābhāge lokamātarnamo 'stu te
GP10bhp_06u:1262: BhP_06.19.007/1 oṃ namo bhagavate mahāpuruṣāya mahānubhāvāya mahāvibhūtipataye saha mahāvibhūtibhirbalimupaharāmīti
GP10bhp_06u:1265: BhP_06.19.008/2 oṃ namo bhagavate mahāpuruṣāya mahāvibhūtipataye svāheti
GP10bhp_06u:1266: BhP_06.19.009/1 śriyaṃ viṣṇuṃ ca varadāvāśiṣāṃ prabhavāvubhau BhP_06.19.009/2 bhaktyā sampūjayen nityaṃ yadīcchet sarvasampadaḥ BhP_06.19.010/1 praṇameddaṇḍavadbhūmau bhaktiprahveṇa cetasā
GP10bhp_06u:1267: BhP_06.19.010/2 daśavāraṃ japen mantraṃ tataḥ stotramudīrayet BhP_06.19.011/1 yuvāṃ tu viśvasya vibhū jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ param
GP10bhp_06u:1268: BhP_06.19.011/2 iyaṃ hi prakṛtiḥ sūkṣmā māyāśaktirduratyayā BhP_06.19.012/1 tasyā adhīśvaraḥ sākṣāt tvameva puruṣaḥ paraḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1269: BhP_06.19.012/2 tvaṃ sarvayajña ijyeyaṃ kriyeyaṃ phalabhug bhavān
GP10bhp_06u:1270: BhP_06.19.013/1 guṇavyaktiriyaṃ devī vyañjako guṇabhug bhavān BhP_06.19.013/2 tvaṃ hi sarvaśarīry ātmā śrīḥ śarīrendriyāśayāḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1272: BhP_06.19.014/1 yathā yuvāṃ trilokasya varadau parameṣṭhinau BhP_06.19.014/2 tathā ma uttamaśloka santu satyā mahāśiṣaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1273: BhP_06.19.015/1 ity abhiṣṭūya varadaṃ śrīnivāsaṃ śriyā saha
GP10bhp_06u:1275: BhP_06.19.016/1 tataḥ stuvīta stotreṇa bhaktiprahveṇa cetasā BhP_06.19.016/2 yajñocchiṣṭamavaghrāya punarabhyarcayeddharim BhP_06.19.017/1 patiṃ ca parayā bhaktyā mahāpuruṣacetasā BhP_06.19.017/2 priyaistaistairupanamet premaśīlaḥ svayaṃ patiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1276: BhP_06.19.017/3 bibhṛyāt sarvakarmāṇi patnyā uccāvacāni ca BhP_06.19.018/1 kṛtamekatareṇāpi dampatyorubhayorapi BhP_06.19.018/2 patnyāṃ kuryādanarhāyāṃ patiretat samāhitaḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1277: BhP_06.19.019/1 viṣṇorvratamidaṃ bibhran na vihanyāt kathañcana BhP_06.19.019/2 viprān striyo vīravatīḥ sraggandhabalimaṇḍanaiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1279: BhP_06.19.020/1 udvāsya devaṃ sve dhāmni tanniveditamagrataḥ BhP_06.19.020/2 adyādātmaviśuddhyarthaṃ sarvakāmasamṛddhaye BhP_06.19.021/1 etena pūjāvidhinā māsān dvādaśa hāyanam BhP_06.19.021/2 nītvāthoparamet sādhvī kārtike carame 'hani
GP10bhp_06u:1281: BhP_06.19.022/2 payaḥśṛtena juhuyāc caruṇā saha sarpiṣā BhP_06.19.022/3 pākayajñavidhānena dvādaśaivāhutīḥ patiḥ
GP10bhp_06u:1282: BhP_06.19.023/1 āśiṣaḥ śirasādāya dvijaiḥ prītaiḥ samīritāḥ BhP_06.19.023/2 praṇamya śirasā bhaktyā bhuñjīta tadanujñayā BhP_06.19.024/1 ācāryamagrataḥ kṛtvā vāgyataḥ saha bandhubhiḥ BhP_06.19.024/2 dadyāt patnyai caroḥ śeṣaṃ suprajāstvaṃ susaubhagam
GP10bhp_06u:1283: BhP_06.19.025/1 etac caritvā vidhivadvrataṃ vibhor abhīpsitārthaṃ labhate
GP10bhp_06u:1284: pumān iha BhP_06.19.025/2 strī caitadāsthāya labheta saubhagaṃ śriyaṃ prajāṃ
GP10bhp_06u:1286: BhP_06.19.026/1 kanyā ca vindeta samagralakṣaṇaṃ patiṃ tvavīrā
GP10bhp_06u:1287: hatakilbiṣāṃ gatim BhP_06.19.026/2 mṛtaprajā jīvasutā dhaneśvarī sudurbhagā subhagā
GP10bhp_06u:1288: BhP_06.19.027/1 vindedvirūpā virujā vimucyate ya āmayāvīndriyakalyadeham BhP_06.19.027/2 etat paṭhannabhyudaye ca karmaṇy anantatṛptiḥ pitṛdevatānām
GP10bhp_06u:1289: BhP_06.19.028/1 tuṣṭāḥ prayacchanti samastakāmān homāvasāne hutabhuk śrīhariśca
GP10bhp_06u:1290: BhP_06.19.028/2 rājan mahan marutāṃ janma puṇyaṃ ditervrataṃ cābhihitaṃ mahat te
